T02D1793-2:82b-39: de'i tshe bsod nams kyi tshogs dang ye shes kyi
T02D1793-2:83a-1: 'gyur pas sdig par ji ltar 'gyur zhes shin tu phal cher thal bas chog go //
T02D1793-2:83a-2: gsad par bya ba de rnams kyi zhes bya ba ni 'tshe bar byed pa rnams kyi'o //
T02D1793-2:83a-3: kha sbyar dbye ba ni snying ga'i padma dbye ba'o //
T02D1793-2:83a-4: phyogs bcu zhes bya ba la sogs pas gdug pa'i
T02D1793-2:83a-5: bdag nyid kyi sems can gyi khams bsgom pas gsod
T02D1793-2:83a-7: sbyor ba bstan pa zhes bya ba nas gsal bar
T02D1793-2:83a-8: bya zhes bya ba'i bar du ni bdud rtsi ldas
T02D1793-2:83a-9: dgra'i gzugs brnyan byas la de'i snying gar ming spel
T02D1793-2:83a-10: te mngon spyod kyi rdzas kyi bskul zhing nyi ma'i
T02D1793-2:83a-11: dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i sna tshogs rdo rjes mtshan
T02D1793-2:83a-12: pa'i rkang pa g-yas pas mnan zhing sngon gyi bsnyen
T02D1793-2:83a-13: pa byas pa'i gshin rje gshed la sogs pa'i khro
T02D1793-2:83a-14: bo'i sngags brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas na bsgrub bya 'chi
T02D1793-2:83a-15: bar 'gyur ro // 'dir thugs rdo rje'i rnal 'byor
T02D1793-2:83a-16: ba bdud rtsi ldas byugs pa'i gos dang ldan pa
T02D1793-2:83a-17: las bya ba dang rnam par snang mdzad kyi rnal
T02D1793-2:83a-18: 'byor pa chu dron gyis gsher pa'i gos gon pa
T02D1793-2:83a-19: dang 'od dpag tu med pa'i rnal 'byor pa bshad
T02D1793-2:83a-20: gcis gsher ba'i gos gon pa dang rin chen 'byung
T02D1793-2:83a-21: ldan gyi rnal 'byor pa thal ba'i chus gsher ba'i
T02D1793-2:83a-23: don yod grub pa'i rnal 'byor pa yang bshang gcis gsher ba'i gos gon pa dang /
T02D1793-2:83a-24: rdo rje 'chang chen po'i rnal 'byor pa yang thal ba'i chus gsher ba'i gos gon pas las bya'o //
T02D1793-2:83a-25: de bzhin du rnal 'byor pa de rnams kyis gshin
T02D1793-2:83a-26: rje gshed la sogs pa khro bo'i nga rgyal la
T02D1793-2:83a-27: dmigs te / snga ma bzhin du gzugs brnyan mnan
T02D1793-2:83a-28: zhing gdug pa rnams gsad par bya'o zhes bstan to
T02D1793-2:83a-29: dmigs te / // gzugs can ma yin pa'i nam
T02D1793-2:83a-30: mkha' yang zhes pa ni gal te gdug pa yin
T02D1793-2:83a-31: na de'i tshe de yang gsod par 'gyur ro //
T02D1793-2:83a-32: gzugs can lta smos kyang ci dgos zhes pa ni
T02D1793-2:83a-33: de nyid phul du byung ba ste khyad par dang
T02D1793-2:83a-35: bsam gtan gyi che ba nyid ni ting nge 'dzin gyi mthu gsal bar byas so //
T02D1793-2:83a-36: tshangs ma mo zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni 'jig rten gyi ma mo bdun no //
T02D1793-2:83a-37: de rnams kyi khang pa ni lha khang ste ma mo ni drag po'i las la mthun pas so //
T02D1793-2:83b-0: dur khrod ni thams cad sdud @83b par byed pas na mthun pa'o //
T02D1793-2:83b-1: khong stong ni skye bos dben pa yin pas rigs pa kho na'o //
T02D1793-2:83b-2: bzhi mdo ni rab tu grags pa yin pas so //
T02D1793-2:83b-3: de bzhin du mtshan ma gcig kyang de bzhin no //
T02D1793-2:83b-4: gnas de rnams la brten te drag po'i las bya'o //
T02D1793-2:83b-5: rje ngar gyi phyogs zhes bya ba la sogs pas de nyid bstan to //
T02D1793-2:83b-6: dgongs pa ni 'di yin te dur khrod kyi ras
T02D1793-2:83b-7: la mngon spyod kyi rdzas kyis sna tshogs rdo rje
T02D1793-2:83b-8: bris la de'i lte bar bsgrub bya'i ming phat gnyis
T02D1793-2:83b-10: sna tshogs rdo rje phyi rol yi ge phat kyis
T02D1793-2:83b-11: bskor zhing 'khor lo de sor brgyad pa'i mi'i rje
T02D1793-2:83b-12: ngar gyi khong stong la bcug nas bsgrub bya'i rkang
T02D1793-2:83b-13: pa'i rdul gyi 'dam gyis bskus la gshin rje gshed
T02D1793-2:83b-14: la sogs pa gang yang rung pa'i khro bo'i sngags
T02D1793-2:83b-15: brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas pas dgra bo'i sgo ru brkos
T02D1793-2:83b-16: nas spas na de'i zhag bdun nam zla ba phyed
T02D1793-2:83b-17: kyis dgra 'chi bar 'gyur ro zhes bstan to //
T02D1793-2:83b-18: sems can shes rab ldan pa dang //
T02D1793-2:83b-19: zhes bya ba la sogs pas sems can thams cad
T02D1793-2:83b-20: la bsam pa thams cad rdzogs par byed pa chags
T02D1793-2:83b-21: pa dang sngags pa med pa /
T02D1793-2:83b-22: sangs rgyas gal te slob dpon la smod par byed
T02D1793-2:83b-23: pa yin na de yang 'jig par 'gyur ba'am gnas
T02D1793-2:83b-24: las spong bar 'gyur ro zhes bstan to //
T02D1793-2:83b-25: thod pa zhes bya ba nas sdud par byed pa'i
T02D1793-2:83b-26: tshig gi bar du ni ma nyams pa'i thod pa
T02D1793-2:83b-27: 'am grog la sogs pa la mngon spyod kyi rdzas
T02D1793-2:83b-28: kyis khro bo'i sngags ming dang bcas par bsgrub bya'i
T02D1793-2:83b-29: ming bris te / khro bo'i tshig gis gshin rje
T02D1793-2:83b-30: gshed la sogs pa'i sngags bzla zhing dgra bo'i sgo
T02D1793-2:83b-31: ru brkos nas sbas na de'i tshe gnas las spo
T02D1793-2:83b-32: ba 'am 'chi bar 'gyur ro zhes bstan to //
T02D1793-2:83b-33: de nas zhes bya ba nas rnam par 'jig par 'gyur ro zhes pa'i bar du ni /
T02D1793-2:83b-34: gnod mdzes kyi rgyal po bsgoms pas phur bus gdab pa'i sgo nas mngon spyod bstan to //
T02D1793-2:83b-35: ji lta ba ji ltar zhes pa ni drag shul la sogs pas so //
T02D1793-2:83b-36: gdug pa'i dngos por gyur cing bdag nyid ngan par son pa'o //
T02D1793-2:83b-37: de lta de ltar zhes pa ni rnam pa de dang des so //
T02D1793-2:83b-38: dgag par bya ba zhes pa ni gsod par bya ba nyid thob pa'o //
T02D1793-2:84a-1: bya ba zhes pa ni dkon mchog gsum la gnod par byed pa la sogs pa'o //
T02D1793-2:84a-2: de rnams kyi ni bsgrub bya rnams kyi'o //
T02D1793-2:84a-3: lus la sogs pa mi g-yo bar byas pa zhes
T02D1793-2:84a-4: pa ni lus dang ngag dang sems phur bus 'debs
T02D1793-2:84a-5: par byed pa'o // de nyid kyi phyir mi phyed
T02D1793-2:84a-6: pa'i ngo bor gyur pa zhes pa ni pha rol
T02D1793-2:84a-7: gyi 'khrul 'khor dang sngags la sogs pas grol bar
T02D1793-2:84a-8: par byed pa'o // ma gyur pa'o // de skad
T02D1793-2:84a-9: ces bya ba la sogs pas mchog dang 'bring dang
T02D1793-2:84a-10: tha ma'i bsgrub bya'i lus la sogs pa phur bus
T02D1793-2:84a-11: gdab par byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin bstan to //
T02D1793-2:84a-12: aom zhes bya ba la sogs pa sngags kyi don bshad pa ni go sla'o //
T02D1793-2:84a-13: phur bu'i sngags 'di zhes bya ba la sogs pas so //
T02D1793-2:84a-14: sngags thos pas mthu che ba'i brgya byin la sogs
T02D1793-2:84a-15: pa 'jigs pa dang brgyal ba dang rdo rje 'chang
T02D1793-2:84a-16: la skyabs su 'gro bar 'gyur ro zhes bstan to
T02D1793-2:84a-17: // 'dir cho ga zhes bya ba la sogs pas
T02D1793-2:84a-18: phur bus gdab pa'i sbyor ba ni don gsal pa'o
T02D1793-2:84a-19: // // seng ldeng gi snying po la sogs pa
T02D1793-2:84a-20: gang rung ba zhes pa ni seng ldeng dang shing
T02D1793-2:84a-21: sha pa dang aa ga ru dang sha mi dang
T02D1793-2:84a-22: lcang ma ste 'bras bu med pa'i shing lnga drag
T02D1793-2:84a-23: shul can gyi las dang mthun pa gzung bar bya'o
T02D1793-2:84a-24: // // // bsam gtan zhes bya ba la sogs
T02D1793-2:84a-25: pas bsgom pa'i dus su rnal 'byor gyi phyogs gcig
T02D1793-2:84a-26: tu gyur pa bgegs bskrad pa'i cho ga bstan to
T02D1793-2:84a-28: nas 'chi bar 'gyur ro zhes pa'i bar du ni
T02D1793-2:84a-29: re zhig dang rnal 'byor pas zhe sdang rdo rje'i
T02D1793-2:84a-30: ting nge 'dzin mngon du byas la reg bya rdo
T02D1793-2:84a-31: rje ma'i chos 'byung gi nang du sna tshogs rdo
T02D1793-2:84a-32: rje dang padma dang nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng
T02D1793-2:84a-33: du khro bo thams cad 'jug pa sngon du 'gro
T02D1793-2:84a-34: bas rdo rje'i lam nas yi ge h'um yongs su
T02D1793-2:84a-35: gyur pa las drag po'i rdo rje las skyes pa
T02D1793-2:84a-36: zhal gsum phyag drug pa spyan gsum pa rigs kyi
T02D1793-2:84a-37: klu brgyad kyis rgyan byas la kha dog sngon po
T02D1793-2:84a-38: // // // // dang / dkar po dang dmar po'i zhal mnga' ba /
T02D1793-2:84a-39: mig yo ba g-yas brkyang ba la gnas pa rdo
T02D1793-2:84a-40: rje dang dril bu rtsa ba'i phyag gnyis kyis bsnams
T02D1793-2:84a-41: pa / zhags pa dang lcags kyu dang ral gri
T02D1793-2:84a-42: dang tho ba bsnams pa zhe sdang rdo rje'i cod
T02D1793-2:84a-43: pa na can smin ma kham pa ha ha hi
T02D1793-2:84a-44: hi'i sgra sgrogs pa gnod mdzes kyi rgyal po bsgoms
T02D1793-2:84b-0: pa / la / @84b rdo rje dang padma'i nang
T02D1793-2:84b-1: nas phyi rol du byung ba'i nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor
T02D1793-2:84b-2: la gnas nas bka' nyan par bsams te /
T02D1793-2:84b-3: snga ma bzhin du reg bya rdo rje ma'i chos 'byung gi nang na /
T02D1793-2:84b-4: gshin rje gshed po la sogs pa khro bo bcu
T02D1793-2:84b-5: sngar bshad pa'i dbyibs dang kha dog dang phyag mtshan
T02D1793-2:84b-6: 'dzin pa bsams la rim pa ji lta ba bzhin
T02D1793-2:84b-7: du phyogs dang mtshams rnams su dgod par bya'o //
T02D1793-2:84b-8: khro bo de rnams kyang steng zhal gsum pa smad
T02D1793-2:84b-9: phur bu rtse gcig pa bdud rtsi 'khyil ba dang
T02D1793-2:84b-11: de'i 'og tu dbus kyi gtso bo'i ngo bo'i bdag
T02D1793-2:84b-12: nyid kyis gnod mdzes la sngags 'dis bka' sbyin par
T02D1793-2:84b-13: bya ste / aom sumbha ni sumbha h'um h'um phat /
T02D1793-2:84b-14: aom gri hna gri hna h'um h'um phat /
T02D1793-2:84b-15: aom gri hn'a pa ya gri hn'a pa ya h'um h'um phat /
T02D1793-2:84b-16: aom a'a na ya ho bha ga b'an badzra h'um h'um phat /
T02D1793-2:84b-17: ces bya ba 'dis phyogs bcu la gnas pa'i brgya
T02D1793-2:84b-18: byin la sogs pa dgug par bya ba'i phyir bka'
T02D1793-2:84b-19: sbyin par bya'o // de thos ma thag tu gnod
T02D1793-2:84b-20: mdzes kyi rgyal pos zhags pa dang lcags kyus phyogs
T02D1793-2:84b-21: sbyin par bya'o // bcur spros te / lha'i dbang
T02D1793-2:84b-22: po la sogs pa 'jig rten skyong ba rnams mgul
T02D1793-2:84b-23: nas bcings la spyi bor brdegs la /
T02D1793-2:84b-24: shar la sogs pa'i phyogs su 'god par byed par bsam par bya'o //
T02D1793-2:84b-25: de nas gnod mdzes kyi rgyal pos rdo rje phur
T02D1793-2:84b-26: bu de rnams mgo bo nas brtsams te rkang pa'i
T02D1793-2:84b-27: dkyil gyi bar du gdab par byed par bsam par
T02D1793-2:84b-28: bya'o // aom gha gha zhes bya ba la sogs
T02D1793-2:84b-29: pa'i sngags kyis phur bus gdab pa dang brdung ba
T02D1793-2:84b-30: bya'o // byas te / sa 'og bdun gyi bar du son par bsam par bya'o //
T02D1793-2:84b-31: khro bo'i rgyal po'i lus las byung ba'i 'bar ba'i
T02D1793-2:84b-32: tshogs kyis kyang de'i 'khor mtha' yas pa bsregs shing
T02D1793-2:84b-33: thal bar gyur par bsam par bya'o zhes bstan par
T02D1793-2:84b-34: bya'o // rdo rje dang padma mnyam par sbyor ba
T02D1793-2:84b-35: dang zhes bya ba nas brtsams nas ldad bar 'gyur
T02D1793-2:84b-36: ro zhes pa'i bar du ni zhes sdang rdo rje'i
T02D1793-2:84b-37: rnal 'byor pas m'a ma k'i'i rang bzhin gyi ye
T02D1793-2:84b-38: shes kyi phyag rgya mdun du bsgoms la rjes su
T02D1793-2:84b-39: chags pa la sogs pa sngon du 'gro bas 'khyud
T02D1793-2:84b-40: bya'o // par byas te / phyag rgya'i chos 'byung

T02D1793-2:99b-24: de rnams gzhom pa'i phyir re zhig dang po rnam
T02D1793-2:99b-25: par snang mdzad la sogs pa gsum gyi nad pa'i
T02D1793-2:99b-26: lte bar yi ge h'um yongs su gyur ba las
T02D1793-2:99b-27: rdo rje gnod sbyin mche ba rnams par gtsigs pa
T02D1793-2:99b-28: drag cing rno ba g-yas brkyang pa las gnas pa
T02D1793-2:99b-29: / sdigs mdzub dang rdo rje gsor bar byed pa bsams te /
T02D1793-2:99b-30: des yi ge kam las byung ba bsgrub bya'i snying
T02D1793-2:99b-31: ga'i phyogs su spro ba la sogs pa'i rnam pa
T02D1793-2:99b-32: gang yang rung ba'i nad drangs pa'i kha nas byung
T02D1793-2:99b-33: ba mdun du rdo rje gnod sbyin de nyid kyis
T02D1793-2:99b-34: rdo rje brgyab pas phye mar btags la rang gi
T02D1793-2:99b-35: lag pa la gnas pa'i 'bar ba'i rdo rje la
T02D1793-2:99b-36: sogs pa'i me'i 'od kyis bsregs par 'gyur zhing thal
T02D1793-2:99b-38: de'i tshe nad rnams 'joms par 'gyur ro //
T02D1793-2:99b-39: de'i 'og tu ye shes sems dpa'i 'od zer gyi
T02D1793-2:99b-40: tshogs kyi gzugs can rnam par snang mdzad dang spyan
T02D1793-2:99b-41: ma la sogs pa'i tshogs spros la /
T02D1793-2:99b-42: snyoms par zhugs pa las byung ba'i byang chub sems
T02D1793-2:99b-43: kyi rgyun gyis de rnams la dbang bskur zhing bsgrub
T02D1793-2:99b-44: bya'i lus por 'od zer gyi sgo nas mar la
T02D1793-2:99b-45: mar bzhin thim par gyur par bsam par bya'o //
T02D1793-2:100a-0: de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa @100a * //
T02D1793-2:100a-1: thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pas bsgrub bya rdo rje'i sku lta bur 'gyur ro zhes bstan to //
T02D1793-2:100a-2: rdzogs pa'i rim pa la gnas pa //
T02D1793-2:100a-4: rdo rje sems dpa' gsungs pa'o //
T02D1793-2:100a-5: zhes pa'i bar du ni phyi dang nang gi nad
T02D1793-2:100a-6: rnams kyis dkrugs pa'i dbang po dang phung po dang
T02D1793-2:100a-7: khams dang skye mched rnams mdun du dmigs la rdo
T02D1793-2:100a-8: rje 'chang chen po la sogs pa'i gang yang rung
T02D1793-2:100a-9: ba'i rnal 'byor pas sems rnam par dag pas thob
T02D1793-2:100a-10: par bya ba'i 'od gsal bar bsgoms pas dkyil 'khor
T02D1793-2:100a-11: rnams las g-yas pa dang g-yon pa g-yon pa gnyis
T02D1793-2:100a-12: dang dal bus dman par rgyu ba dmar po la
T02D1793-2:100a-13: sogs pa'i 'od zer gyi tshogs spros la dkyil 'khor
T02D1793-2:100a-14: re re la dgu brgya dgu brgya bzlas pas nyin
T02D1793-2:100a-15: mo dang mtshan mor nyi khri chig stong dag gis
T02D1793-2:100a-16: drug brgya bzlas nas gdong gi sna'i rtse mor 'od
T02D1793-2:100a-17: zer gyi thig le 'dzin na de'i tshe nad pa'i
T02D1793-2:100a-20: ya yi don gyi gang ci 'ang rung //
T02D1793-2:100a-21: dngos grub 'dod pas bya ba ste //
T02D1793-2:100a-22: ra la sogs pa gsum nyid kyis //
T02D1793-2:100a-23: 'gro ba'i don la rab tu 'jug / me dang rlung dang dbang chen dang //
T02D1793-2:100a-24: chu yi dkyil 'khor re re la //
T02D1793-2:100a-25: thun ni phyed phyed dus su ni //
T02D1793-2:100a-26: las ni gnyis gnyis byed par 'gyur //
T02D1793-2:100a-28: de ni rdo rje bzlas pa'i rim pas nad las thar ba'o //
T02D1793-2:100a-29: de bzhin 'od gsal ba las cig car du ye shes kyi sku 'am rdo rje'i sku spros la /
T02D1793-2:100a-30: ba spu'i bu ga thams cad las 'od zer gyi
T02D1793-2:100a-31: 'khor lo spros la de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam pa
T02D1793-2:100a-32: can gyi 'od des nad pa'i lus nad med par
T02D1793-2:100a-33: byas nas de nyid du 'jug par bsam par bya'o
T02D1793-2:100a-34: // de'i tshe bsgrub bya ni nad med par 'gyur ro //
T02D1793-2:100a-35: de sa ni bdag la byin gyis brlab ba dang
T02D1793-2:100a-36: zung du 'jug pa dag gis nad med par 'gyur
T02D1793-2:100a-38: de ltar rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i spyod pa dang ldan
T02D1793-2:100a-39: pas pha rol rnams kyi nad 'joms par byed de
T02D1793-2:100a-40: / de ltar zhes bya ba nas dngos so zhes
T02D1793-2:100a-41: bya ba'i bar du ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams
T02D1793-2:100a-42: cad kyi bdag po rdo rje 'chang gi sgyu ma
T02D1793-2:100a-43: lta bu'i dngos po rmi lam gyi dbe'i [?] sgo
T02D1793-2:100a-44: nas so sor snang ba tsam gyi snying por gyur
T02D1793-2:100a-45: pa la rtag pa dang chad pa'i 'khrul pa yod
T02D1793-2:100b-1: sgrub pa po rnam pa gnyis kyis zhes pa ni rdzogs pa dang ma rdzogs pa rnams so //
T02D1793-2:100b-2: mtshan ma dang bcas pa dang mtshan ma med pa'i
T02D1793-2:100b-3: dbye bas zhes pa ni rtog pa dang bcas pa
T02D1793-2:100b-4: dang rtog pa med pa'i rgyus rmi lam mthong ba'o
T02D1793-2:100b-5: // rnam pa gnyis kyis de nyid kyi 'bras bu dang 'brel ba yin no //
T02D1793-2:100b-6: de la zhes bya ba nas mngon gsum du byed
T02D1793-2:100b-7: par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bar du ni sems
T02D1793-2:100b-8: rnam par dag pa'i rim par 'od gsal ba thob
T02D1793-2:100b-9: nas de las byung ba'i ye shes kyi sku dang
T02D1793-2:100b-10: de bzhin du mngon par byang chub pa'i rim pas
T02D1793-2:100b-11: 'od gsal ba la 'jug pas rdo rje'i sku brgya
T02D1793-2:100b-12: byin la sogs pa'i 'jig rten pa sangs rgyas dang
T02D1793-2:100b-13: byang chub sems dpa'i 'jig rten las 'das pas mchod
T02D1793-2:100b-14: par 'gyur ba bdag nyid rmi lam du mthong na
T02D1793-2:100b-15: de'i tshe myur du phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub
T02D1793-2:100b-17: sems can chen po zhes bya ba nas rmi lam
T02D1793-2:100b-18: gyi 'bras bu'o zhes pa'i bar du ni thugs rdo
T02D1793-2:100b-19: rje la sogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i rnam
T02D1793-2:100b-20: pa can sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' la
T02D1793-2:100b-21: sogs pas mchod par gyur pa de'i tshe pha rol
T02D1793-2:100b-22: rnams la yang de'i rnam pa ster ba la nus
T02D1793-2:100b-23: pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro zhes bstan to //
T02D1793-2:100b-24: rgyan rnams thams cad ces bya ba nas rig par
T02D1793-2:100b-25: 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bar du ni lha'i bu
T02D1793-2:100b-26: mo gzugs bzang ba legs par brgyan pa dang de
T02D1793-2:100b-27: bzhin du mi la sogs pa'i bu mo dang khye'u
T02D1793-2:100b-28: rnal 'byor pa la mchod pa byed pa mthong na
T02D1793-2:100b-29: de zhi ba la sogs pa'i dngos grub thob par
T02D1793-2:100b-31: khye'u dang bu mo ni shes rab dang thabs kyi rang bzhin yin pas so //
T02D1793-2:100b-32: phyogs bcu zhes bya ba nas rmi lam mthong ba'i
T02D1793-2:100b-33: 'bras bu zhes pa'i bar du ni rnal 'byor ba
T02D1793-2:100b-34: gang zhig sangs rgyas kyi zhing la gnas pa de
T02D1793-2:100b-35: bzhin gshegs pa'i tshogs mthong ba dang /
T02D1793-2:100b-36: de bzhin du gang la bcom ldan 'das ma la
T02D1793-2:100b-37: sogs pa'i shes rab kyi glegs bam de bzhin gshegs
T02D1793-2:100b-38: pas lag tu stsol ba dang /
T02D1793-2:100b-39: gang zhig seng ge'i khri la bzhugs pa chos ston
T02D1793-2:100b-40: pa la rtsol ba sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems
T02D1793-2:100b-41: dpas yongs su bskor bar bdag nyid mthong na des
T02D1793-2:101a-0: @101a * // phyag rgya chen po'i 'bras bu thong bar 'gyur ro zhes bstan to //
T02D1793-2:101a-1: kun dga' ra ba nas rmi lam gyi 'bras bu
T02D1793-2:101a-2: thob par 'gyur ro zhes kyang gsungs so zhes pa'i
T02D1793-2:101a-3: bar du ni lha'i bu dang bu mos brgyan pa
T02D1793-2:101a-4: kun dga' ra ba dang nags tshal la sogs pa
T02D1793-2:101a-6: rnal 'byor pa gang zhig mthong ba des ni zhi
T02D1793-2:101a-7: ba la sogs pa'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur ro
T02D1793-2:101a-8: zhes gsungs so // de bzhin du sangs rgyas dang
T02D1793-2:101a-9: byang chub sems dpa' dbang bskur ba gang zhig mthong
T02D1793-2:101a-10: ba de ni rig pa 'dzin pa'i gtso bor 'gyur
T02D1793-2:101a-12: mngon par 'dod pa'i rmi lam zhes bya ba nas
T02D1793-2:101a-13: grub cing thob par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bar
T02D1793-2:101a-14: du ni sngar bshad pa'i dge ba'i rmi lam gyis
T02D1793-2:101a-15: phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub thob pa nyid du
T02D1793-2:101a-16: bstan to // gdol ba zhes bya ba nas bar
T02D1793-2:101a-17: du'o zhes pa'i bar du ni rnal 'byor pa gang
T02D1793-2:101a-18: zhig gdol pa la sogs pa'i rigs ngan dang de
T02D1793-2:101a-19: bzhin du gzugs 'jigs pa spre dang yi dags la
T02D1793-2:101a-20: sogs par mi lam du mthong na des nges par
T02D1793-2:101a-21: dam tshig nyams pa yin no zhes bstan to //
T02D1793-2:101a-22: dam tshig stong pa'i rgyu des dngos grub sgrub pa
T02D1793-2:101a-23: la 'jug par 'gyur na nad la sogs pas lus
T02D1793-2:101a-24: zil gyis mnan par 'gyur ro zhes bstan to //
T02D1793-2:101a-25: de la de kho na nyid bsgrub pa zhes bya
T02D1793-2:101a-26: ba nas chos nyid med pa'o zhes pa'i bar du
T02D1793-2:101a-28: g-yo ba'i rang bzhin gyi dngos po rnams rang gi
T02D1793-2:101a-29: sems kyi snang ba tsam las ldog pa ni med
T02D1793-2:101a-30: de / rmi lam dang 'dra bas so //
T02D1793-2:101a-31: sems kyang rnam par dpyad na 'od gsal ba'i rang bzhin yin pas so ;
T02D1793-2:101a-32: /'od gsal ba yang rnam par mi rtog pa'i gnas
T02D1793-2:101a-33: skabs su 'di nyid dang bdag nyid du mi dmigs
T02D1793-2:101a-34: te rnam par mi rtog pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1793-2:101a-35: de ltar chos can dang chos nyid gnyi ga yang
T02D1793-2:101a-36: rnal 'byor pa'i mngon sum gyi tshad mas mi dmigs
T02D1793-2:101a-37: te / 'ba' zhig dri ma med pas byang chub tsam la /
T02D1793-2:101a-38: gnas pa'i rgyu dang ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pa rnam gnyis mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1793-2:101a-39: rnam bcas dngos po'i rtog pa dang //
T02D1793-2:101a-40: rnam pa med pa'i rtog pa ste //
T02D1793-2:101a-41: gcig tu byas nas gang spyod pa //
T02D1793-2:101a-42: de ni zung 'jug bshad pa yin //
T02D1793-2:101b-0: de bzhin khams dang zhes bya ba @101b la sogs
T02D1793-2:101b-1: pa la dbang po dang rnam par shes pa nye
T02D1793-2:101b-2: bar bsdus pa'i bdag nyid can gyi shes pa gnyis
T02D1793-2:101b-3: po ni snang ba dang snang ba mched pa zhes
T02D1793-2:101b-4: bya ba'o // legs 'dus pa ni rtag tu so sor snang bar 'gyur ba'o //
T02D1793-2:101b-5: stong chen nyid 'gyur ni snang ba nye bar thob pa'i ye shes yod na'o //
T02D1793-2:101b-6: rlung la brten pa ni rlung gi tshogs kyi dbang gis so //
T02D1793-2:101b-7: nges par rmi lam mthong ba zhes pa ni sad
T02D1793-2:101b-8: pa'i gnas skabs su mthong ba gang yin pa de
T02D1793-2:101b-9: rmi lam du mthong bar 'gyur te /
T02D1793-2:101b-10: rtog pa dang bcas pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1793-2:101b-11: gang zhig rmi lam dang mtshungs pa'i chos rnams yongs
T02D1793-2:101b-12: su shes pas 'bras bu 'dod pa'i 'od gsal ba'i
T02D1793-2:101b-13: go 'phang mngon du byed pa'i rnal 'byor pa des
T02D1793-2:101b-14: kun brtags pa ni rmi lam dang sad pa la
T02D1793-2:101b-16: chos rnams zhes bya ba la sogs pas rnal 'byor
T02D1793-2:101b-17: pa de nyid kyis brdzun dang bden pa las grol
T02D1793-2:101b-18: ba dngos po rmi lam dang mtshungs pa snang bar
T02D1793-2:101b-20: gnyid log pa dang sad pa zhes //
T02D1793-2:101b-21: de dag rtogs ni gnyis spangs pa'i //
T02D1793-2:101b-22: ston pas zung 'jug gsungs pa ste //
T02D1793-2:101b-23: gnyid log sad dang rnam bral ba'o //
T02D1793-2:101b-25: de ltar yi ge gsum tsam la gnas pa'i rnal
T02D1793-2:101b-26: 'byor ba rtog pa dang bcas par 'gyur bas rmi
T02D1793-2:101b-27: lam mthong ba dang 'od gsal ba la 'jug pas
T02D1793-2:101b-29: 'on kyang gnyid log pa dang sad pa dang 'dra
T02D1793-2:101b-30: bar dngos po'i ngo bo mthong bar 'gyur ro zhes
T02D1793-2:101b-32: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pas dngos po
T02D1793-2:101b-33: rnams sgyu ma lta bur shes nas ngo bo med
T02D1793-2:101b-34: par 'gyur na / rmi lam dang rmi lam gyi
T02D1793-2:101b-35: 'bras bu de rnams gang las 'gyur zhes bcom ldan
T02D1793-2:101b-37: ngo mtshar ba dang rmad du byung ba thob par 'gyur ro zhes bstan to //
T02D1793-2:101b-38: de bzhin gshegs pa'i dgongs pa zhes bya ba la
T02D1793-2:101b-39: sogs pa nas 'od gsal ba'i ngo bo nyid do
T02D1793-2:101b-40: zhes bya ba'i bar du ni dngos po rnams kyi
T02D1793-2:101b-41: ngo bo med pa nyid bstan to //
T02D1793-2:101b-42: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ces bya ba ni mi bskyod pa la sogs pa bod pa'o //
T02D1793-2:101b-43: bum pa dang snam bu la sogs pa zhes bya
T02D1793-2:101b-44: ba ni sems dang ldan pa dang sems dang mi
T02D1793-2:102a-0: @102a * // ldan ba'i bdag nyid kyi dngos pos so //
T02D1793-2:102a-1: mi ldan pa ni gcig gi ngo bo ma yin
T02D1793-2:102a-2: te tha dad pa nyid du snang ba'i phyir ro
T02D1793-2:102a-3: // de la bum pa la sogs pa dngos po rnams ni 'dus byas te /
T02D1793-2:102a-4: rgyu dang rkyen gyis bskyed pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1793-2:102a-5: nam mkha' ni 'dus ma byas pa ste /
T02D1793-2:102a-7: gzugs dang ldan pa dang gzugs med pa nyid kyis
T02D1793-2:102a-8: bum pa la sogs pa dang nam mkha' ni tha
T02D1793-2:102a-10: mi ldan pa yang ma yin te ldan pa kho na'o //
T02D1793-2:102a-11: dngos po thams cad ces pa ni sems can dang
T02D1793-2:102a-12: snod kyi 'jig rten gyi bdag nyid kyi de'i ngo
T02D1793-2:102a-13: bo yin pa'i phyir ro zhes pa ni nam mkha'
T02D1793-2:102a-14: ni dngos po thams cad kyi nang du chud pa'i
T02D1793-2:102a-15: phyir ro // khyab pa ni nam mkha' khyab par byed pa ste /
T02D1793-2:102a-16: me dro ba'i reg pa bzhin no //
T02D1793-2:102a-17: ngo bo nyid la gnas pa zhes pa ni dngos
T02D1793-2:102a-18: po rnams la med par mi 'byung bas gnas pa
T02D1793-2:102a-19: ste / dngos po ni 'byung ba chen po lnga'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1793-2:102a-20: gnyis po de dag ni khyab par byed pa dang mthong ba med pa nyid do //
T02D1793-2:102a-21: mngon pa'i nga rgyal yang zhes pa ni sems pa med de /
T02D1793-2:102a-22: de bems po yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1793-2:102a-23: nam mkha' de zhes bya ba la sogs pas de nyid bsdu bar byed de /
T02D1793-2:102a-24: de ltar zhes bya ba la sogs pas dpe bstan nas dpe las byung ba bstan par bya ste /
T02D1793-2:102a-25: ji ltar nam mkha' la bum pa la sogs pas
T02D1793-2:102a-26: ldan pa dang mi ldan pa med pa de bzhin
T02D1793-2:102a-27: du rmi lam dang de'i 'bras bu dag la yang
T02D1793-2:102a-28: ldan pa dang mi ldan pa dag med do zhes
T02D1793-2:102a-29: bstan to // dgongs pa ni 'di yin te /
T02D1793-2:102a-30: re zhig rmi lam ni don med pa rang gi
T02D1793-2:102a-31: rnam par rtog pa'i bag chags las 'byung bar 'gyur
T02D1793-2:102a-32: te / de'i 'bras bu dang 'brel bas ga las
T02D1793-2:102a-33: 'gyur zhes bya ba nas rmi lam dang 'bras bu
T02D1793-2:102a-35: 'on kyang rnam par mi rtog pa nyid rmi lam
T02D1793-2:102a-36: ltar so sor snang ba'i 'bras bu'i rnam par snang
T02D1793-2:102a-37: bar 'gyur ro zhes de dag dang ldan pa'o //
T02D1793-2:102a-38: de nyid kyi rnam par dag pa zhes pa ni nam mkha'i de kho na nyid bstan to //
T02D1793-2:102a-39: ji lta ji ltar nam mkha' la mthong ba med
T02D1793-2:102a-40: pa dang thos pa med pa nyid yod pa de
T02D1793-2:102a-41: bzhin du dngos po thams cad so sor snang ba
T02D1793-2:102b-1: ci dgos zhes bya ba la sogs pas rmi lam
T02D1793-2:102b-2: de'i 'bras bu dag ngo bo med pa yang ma
T02D1793-2:102b-4: brtags pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1793-2:102b-5: chos thams cad ces bya ba la sogs pas sems
T02D1793-2:102b-6: can gyi 'jig rten dang snod kyi 'jig rten dang
T02D1793-2:102b-7: khams gsum la gnas pa'i ngag gi spros pa de
T02D1793-2:102b-8: dag thams cad sems kyi rang bzhin kho na dang
T02D1793-2:102b-9: de bzhin du sems kyi rnam pa so sor snang
T02D1793-2:102b-10: ba lus dang ngag dang sems dang phung po dang
T02D1793-2:102b-11: / khams dang skye mched kyi chos thams cad gang
T02D1793-2:102b-12: yin pa de rnams la khyab par byed pa nam
T02D1793-2:102b-13: mkha' dang khyab par bya ba'i sems can gyi rigs
T02D1793-2:102b-14: bzhi'i dbye bas gnas pa de dang thams cad ji
T02D1793-2:102b-15: ltar sngar bshad pa'i rigs pas /
T02D1793-2:102b-16: nam mkha' dang 'dra ba bzhin du chos thams cad bskyed pa dang /
T02D1793-2:102b-17: gnas pa dang 'jig pa med pas 'od gsal ba'i rang bzhin yin no zhes bstan to //
T02D1793-2:102b-18: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ces bya ba la
T02D1793-2:102b-19: sogs pas sgyu ma'i skus dngos po rnams sgyu ma
T02D1793-2:102b-20: lta bu nyid du bstan to //
T02D1793-2:102b-21: dus gsum du gshegs pa zhes pa ni 'das pa la sogs pa'i dus gsum la bzhugs pa'o //
T02D1793-2:102b-22: de rnams kyi ye shes kyi sku'o zhes pa ni 'od gsal ba las cig car du 'byung ba'o //

T02D1793-2:112b-45: la snga ma bzhin du khrus byas nas dar dpyangs
T02D1793-2:112b-46: dang me tog gi phreng ba bcings la /

T02D1793-2:114b-2: sngags la tshim pa dang sngar ba dang gsol ba
T02D1793-2:114b-3: ni cho ga 'dis byas nas phyin nas thams cad
T02D1793-2:114b-4: bsgrub par bya'o // de'i rim pa ni rgya mtsho la rgyu ba'i gtsang po'i gam du phyin nas /
T02D1793-2:114b-5: de'i 'gram gnyis kyis blangs nas ma 'dres par brdungs
T02D1793-2:114b-6: te aa ka ru dang tsandan dang padma ge sar
T02D1793-2:114b-7: gyi phye ma dang 'dres pas gong bu byas te
T02D1793-2:114b-8: padma'i snal mas bcings la ga pur dang spos kyis
T02D1793-2:114b-9: bdugs la nyin zhag gcig tu mar dang sbrang rtsis
T02D1793-2:114b-10: bkang ba'i snod la gzhag ste phyi nas zhag gsum
T02D1793-2:114b-11: gyi bar du dri chu dkar po'i 'jam gyi rgyun
T02D1793-2:114b-12: gyis sngags 'dis dbang bskur bar bya'o //
T02D1793-2:114b-13: aom sarba de ba de bya mu tta re sv'a h'a /
T02D1793-2:114b-14: aom h'um phat ne sv'a h'a rim pa ji ltar
T02D1793-2:114b-15: bzhu ba de bzhin du de'i tshe rgya mtsho la
T02D1793-2:114b-16: rgyu ba'i gtsang por phyin nas bskyal bar bya'o //
T02D1793-2:114b-17: de ltar sngags kyis lha tshim pas myur du dngos grub ster bar 'gyur ro //
T02D1793-2:114b-18: blugs gzar gyis kyang mar gyi dgang blugs stong gis
T02D1793-2:114b-19: sbar ba dang gsal ba aom hri zhes sngags kyis
T02D1793-2:114b-20: bya'o // de ltar tshim pa dang dbul ba'i rim gyis thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro //
T02D1793-2:114b-21: de nas phyi'i sbyin sreg gi cho ga bstan to //
T02D1793-2:114b-22: de nyid bstan pa'i phyir sbyin sreg bya zhes pa ni phyi'i sbyin sreg bya ba'o //
T02D1793-2:114b-23: 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dngos
T02D1793-2:114b-24: grub 'dod pa ni zhi ba la sogs pa dang
T02D1793-2:114b-26: sngags pa'o zhes pa ni sbyin sreg gi cho ga la mkhas pa'i rdo rje slob dpon no //
T02D1793-2:114b-27: gnyi ga'i rgyud ni rnal 'byor dang rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud do //
T02D1793-2:114b-28: de las gsungs pa'i cho ga ni rim pa ji ltar sngar bshad pa'o //
T02D1793-2:114b-29: de yan chad kyis phyi'i sbyin sreg bshad do //
T02D1793-2:114b-30: nang gi zhes bya ba nas go sla ste zhes
T02D1793-2:114b-31: pa'i bar du ni ji ltar btung ba dang bza'
T02D1793-2:114b-32: ba ji ltar rnyed pa bdud rtsi lnga'i tshogs legs
T02D1793-2:114b-33: par sbyangs la lag pa dang mgrin pa sbyangs shing
T02D1793-2:114b-34: ye shes sems dpa'i me lha bsreg par bya ba
T02D1793-2:114b-35: dang / de bzhin du tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i mthar lhag ma thams cad bsdus la /
T02D1793-2:114b-36: dbang po gnyis dang snyoms par zhugs pa sngon du 'gro ba'i las kyi dbye bas /
T02D1793-2:114b-37: dkar po la sogs pa'i kha dog gi rnam pa
T02D1793-2:114b-38: can gyi me thab kyi nang du shin tu sbar
T02D1793-2:115a-0: ba'i me'i lta'i zhal nas ye shes @115a * //
T02D1793-2:115a-1: kyi me lha sbyin par bya'o zhes bstan to //
T02D1793-2:115a-2: de ni nang gi sbyin sreg go //
T02D1793-2:115a-3: gzhan yang dngos po med pa'i nang gi mtshan nyid kyi sbyin sreg yin te /
T02D1793-2:115a-5: nang gi sbyin sreg las ni rnam par rtog pa'i tshogs //
T02D1793-2:115a-6: sreg par byed de thub dbang zla bas gsungs //
T02D1793-2:115a-7: bgegs dang dngos grub rnam par rtog pa tsam //
T02D1793-2:115a-8: gnyis med de nyid rnam par rtog pas stong //
T02D1793-2:115a-9: thams cad stong pa'i dbang yid de thab ces bya ba //
T02D1793-2:115a-10: padma rdo rje dang ldan dngos po thams cad bud shing gis phyug pa //
T02D1793-2:115a-11: nam mkha'i dkyil bzhin dri med rgya chen rtog ba tsam ni 'bru dang ldan//
T02D1793-2:115a-12: shes rab me yis shin tu 'bar zhing nyon mongs sdig pa rab tu zhi //
T02D1793-2:115a-13: sras bcas bde gshegs yum gyi gzi brjid 'bar bas rab tu khyab //
T02D1793-2:115a-14: khams gsum srid pa'i thab la 'du byed thams cad bsreg bya yin //
T02D1793-2:115a-15: ngan song lam la nges sbyar phung po khams sogs bud shing rnams kyis ni //
T02D1793-2:115a-16: rtog pa thams cad las grol zhi ba'i las ni gyis //
T02D1793-2:115a-17: de bzhin du dpal sangs rgyas ye shes zhabs kyis kyang /
T02D1793-2:115a-18: phyi yi sbyin sreg cho ga rtogs bya ba //
T02D1793-2:115a-19: yid kyis byas pa nang gi bdag nyid de //
T02D1793-2:115a-20: phung po la sogs bud shing sreg byed pa //
T02D1793-2:115a-21: ye shes 'bar ba bla na med par bshad //
T02D1793-2:115a-23: sgra ji bzhin ma yin par bshad pa'o zhes pa
T02D1793-2:115a-24: ni 'jig rten dang bstan bcos las phyi rol du
T02D1793-2:115a-25: byas pa'i sgra'i sgo nas nang gi sbyin sreg gi
T02D1793-2:115a-27: rnam par snang mdzad ces bya ba nas der 'jug
T02D1793-2:115a-28: par bya'o zhes bya ba'i bar du ni rdo rje
T02D1793-2:115a-29: 'chang chen po yongs su gyur pa las bdag zhe
T02D1793-2:115a-30: sdang rdo rje nyid bsgoms la mdun du yi ge
T02D1793-2:115a-31: gsum yongs su gyur pa las 'od dpag tu med
T02D1793-2:115a-32: pa'i rnam pa can kha dog dmar po slob mas
T02D1793-2:115a-33: bsgoms la / de'i yan lag thams cad la yi
T02D1793-2:115a-34: ge aa bkod nas mgo bo dang lkog ma dang
T02D1793-2:115a-35: snying ga dang rkang pa'i 'og tu yi ge h'um
T02D1793-2:115a-36: bsgoms la / dzheem bkod la / yang yi ge
T02D1793-2:115a-37: dzheem las 'od zer gyi tshogs rkang pa'i khong ston
T02D1793-2:115a-38: gnas zhugs pas yi ge h'um la sogs pa yongs
T02D1793-2:115a-39: su gyur pa las bskyed pa'i mi bskyod pa la
T02D1793-2:115a-40: sogs pa bkus zhing mgul ba la sogs pa gsum
T02D1793-2:115b-0: de'i lce la aa bkod pa las @115b byung ba'i 'od dpag tu med pa bsgoms te /
T02D1793-2:115b-1: rdo rje smros shig ces dris nas de'i ngag nas
T02D1793-2:115b-2: 'das pa la sogs pa shes nas mi bskyod pa
T02D1793-2:115b-3: la sogs pa la gshegs su gsol bar byas te
T02D1793-2:115b-4: srung ba'i 'khor los snod bsrung bar bya'o zhes bstan
T02D1793-2:115b-5: to // 'di ni zhes bya ba nas sngags kyi
T02D1793-2:115b-6: rdo rje ni 'di yin no zhes pa'i bar du
T02D1793-2:115b-7: ni dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa las sngon du dkyil
T02D1793-2:115b-8: 'khor gyi sgo la gnas pa gos dmar pos mig
T02D1793-2:115b-9: la bkab pa'i slob ma yi ge lnga pa'i sngags
T02D1793-2:115b-11: de nas sngar bshad pa'i rdo rje dbab par bya'o zhes bstan to //
T02D1793-2:115b-12: de la zhes bya ba nas bstim par bya'o zhes
T02D1793-2:115b-13: pa'i bar du ni rdo rje slob dpon gyis slob
T02D1793-2:115b-14: ma la dbang bskur ba'i don du dkyil 'khor bris
T02D1793-2:115b-15: la nam mkha' la bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa
T02D1793-2:115b-16: rnams gzugs rdo rje ma la sogs pas mchod cing
T02D1793-2:115b-17: de rnams bkug nas dkyil 'khor la bstim par bya'o
T02D1793-2:115b-18: zhes bstan to // rdo rje sku gsum zhes bya
T02D1793-2:115b-19: ba nas dgod par bya'o zhes bya ba'i bar du
T02D1793-2:115b-20: ni rigs pa'i dbang bskur ba'i dus su thabs dang
T02D1793-2:115b-21: shes rab snyoms par zhugs pa las byung ba'i byang
T02D1793-2:115b-22: chub kyi sems kyi thig le 'od zer gyi tshogs
T02D1793-2:115b-23: kyis bskul ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dang /
T02D1793-2:115b-24: de bzhin du ye shes kyi chus gang ba'i bum
T02D1793-2:115b-25: pa bsnams pa spyan la sogs pa rdo rje sems
T02D1793-2:115b-26: dpa' ring nge 'dzin la gnas pa'i rdo rje slob
T02D1793-2:115b-28: de rnams kyis slob ma dbang bskur te de'i ba
T02D1793-2:115b-29: spu'i bu ga'i sgo nas de rnams bcug la de
T02D1793-2:115b-30: bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ngo bor bya'o zhes
T02D1793-2:115b-31: bstan to // de ltar zhes bya ba nas slob
T02D1793-2:115b-32: mas dbugs dbyung bar bya'o zhes pa'i bar du ni
T02D1793-2:115b-33: rig pa'i dbang bskur sbyin pa'i phyir ram /
T02D1793-2:115b-34: phyir mi ldog pa'i dbang sbyin pa'i don du khams
T02D1793-2:115b-35: gsum pa'i chos kyi rgyal srid la rab tu gzhag
T02D1793-2:115b-36: par byed pa / mi phyed pa rdo rje 'chang
T02D1793-2:115b-37: che po'i rang bzhin dbang bskur khyod la sbyin na
T02D1793-2:115b-38: de nas khyod kyis ji lta ba bzhin du nan
T02D1793-2:115b-40: de la zhes bya ba nas bla mas dbang bskur
T02D1793-2:115b-41: sbyin par bya'o zhes pa'i bar du ni ji ltar
T02D1793-2:115b-42: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang chen pos mi bskyod
T02D1793-2:116a-1: la dbang bskur ba de bzhin du shin tu bsgral
T02D1793-2:116a-2: bar dka' ba'i 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho las bsgral ba'i
T02D1793-2:116a-3: don du bcom ldan 'das rdo rje bla ma de
T02D1793-2:116a-4: bzhin du bdag la yang stsol lo zhes rdo rje
T02D1793-2:116a-5: slob mas bla ma la gsol ba gdab par bya
T02D1793-2:116a-6: ba dang de bzhin du de dang 'dra ba'i zhu
T02D1793-2:116a-7: bas mgu ba'i rdo rje slob dpon gyis /
T02D1793-2:116a-8: phyir mi ldog pa'i dbang de la sbyin par bya'o zhes bstan to //
T02D1793-2:116a-9: lha'i gzugs zhes bya ba nas dgod par bya'o zhes
T02D1793-2:116a-10: pa'i bar du ni phyir mi ldog pa'i dbang bskur
T02D1793-2:116a-11: gyi mthar nam mkha'i khams na bzhugs pa'i de bzhin
T02D1793-2:116a-12: gshegs pa la sogs pa gang gis slob ma dbang
T02D1793-2:116a-13: bskur ba de rnams gcig tu bsdus te 'od zer
T02D1793-2:116a-14: gyi tshogs kyi tshul du tshangs pa'i sgo nas 'jug
T02D1793-2:116a-15: cing sku'i dkyil 'khor khyab nas gnas pa bsgoms la
T02D1793-2:116a-16: / de'i snying ga'i padmar lhag par mos pa'i dbang
T02D1793-2:116a-17: gis yi dam gyi lha dgod par bya'o zhes bstan
T02D1793-2:116a-18: / to ; / de ltar zhes bya ba nas
T02D1793-2:116a-19: zhes kyang gsungs zhes pa'i bar du ni snang bar
T02D1793-2:116a-20: gyur pa'i shes rab dang ldan pa'i slob ma la
T02D1793-2:116a-21: dkyil 'khor gyi de kho na nyid dang //
T02D1793-2:116a-22: lha'i de kho na nyid dang /
T02D1793-2:116a-23: le'u lnga pa las gsungs pa'i dam tshig lnga sbyin par bya'o zhes bstan to //
T02D1793-2:116a-24: sngags kyis zhes bya ba nas lha'i rnal 'byor byin
T02D1793-2:116a-25: la zhes pa'i bar du ni slob mas zhus pa'i
T02D1793-2:116a-26: bla mas / de'i mos pa spyad cing dris la
T02D1793-2:116a-27: de dang rjes su mthun pa'i sngags dang de'i brjod
T02D1793-2:116a-28: par bya bar 'gyur ba'i lha'i ting nge 'dzin la
T02D1793-2:116a-29: sbyin par bya'o zhes bstan to //
T02D1793-2:116a-30: gsang ba zhes bya ba nas rnyed par mi dka'
T02D1793-2:116a-31: ba'o zhes bya ba'i bar du ni mchod pa sngon
T02D1793-2:116a-32: du 'gro bar gsol ba gdab ste /
T02D1793-2:116a-33: slob mas bla ma la phyag rgya dbul bar bya ba dang /
T02D1793-2:116a-34: des kyang snyoms par zhugs pa'i rim gyis sangs rgyas thams cad bkug la /
T02D1793-2:116a-35: ngag gi lam nas zhugs te snang ba la sogs
T02D1793-2:116a-36: pa'i rim gyis de kho na nyid myong zhing phyag
T02D1793-2:116a-37: rgya'i padmar byang chub kyi sems spro zhing de las
T02D1793-2:116a-38: sa la ma lhung ba dung phor gyis blangs la
T02D1793-2:116a-39: lhag ma bdud rtsi bzhi dang sbyar te yi ge
T02D1793-2:116a-40: gsum gyis sbyangs pa la sogs pa byas nas de
T02D1793-2:116a-41: bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bsdus pa'i blos kye ma
T02D1793-2:116b-0: ho bde ba chen po zhes tshig @116b brjod pa'i
T02D1793-2:116b-1: slob ma spyod du gzhug go zhes bstan to //
T02D1793-2:116b-2: rnyed par mi dka' ba ni rdo rje sems dpa'i
T02D1793-2:116b-3: go 'phang rnyed par dka' ba ma yin te de'i
T02D1793-2:116b-4: dus nas brtsams te zhes bya ba nas 'byung bas
T02D1793-2:116b-5: so // de ltar zhes bya ba nas bar du'o
T02D1793-2:116b-6: zhes bya ba'i bar du ni rig pa'i dbang bskur
T02D1793-2:116b-7: ba'i 'og tu slob ma la lha'i de kho na
T02D1793-2:116b-9: de la sogs pa khams bzhi'i rang bzhin gyi spyan
T02D1793-2:116b-10: ma la sogs pa dkyil 'khor du snang ba yin
T02D1793-2:116b-11: pa de rnams 'dod chags kyi rigs can sems can
T02D1793-2:116b-12: rjes su gzung ba'i don du rnam par snang mdzad
T02D1793-2:116b-13: la sogs pa yongs su gyur pa las byung ba
T02D1793-2:116b-14: yin gyi zhi ba la sogs pa'i las kyi tshogs
T02D1793-2:116b-15: bzhi sgrub par byed pa'i phyir yin par bstan te
T02D1793-2:116b-16: / de kho na nyid la skyes pa dang bud
T02D1793-2:116b-17: med kyi dbye ba ni med de tha mi dad
T02D1793-2:116b-18: / pa'i phyir ro // de yang nye bar mtshon
T02D1793-2:116b-19: pa tsam yin te gzhan yang zhi ba dang drag
T02D1793-2:116b-20: po dang bar ma'i gzugs can gyi de bzhin gshegs
T02D1793-2:116b-21: pa dang byang chub sems dpa' dang lha mo dang
T02D1793-2:116b-22: khro bo rnams ni de dang de rnam par dag
T02D1793-2:116b-23: pa dang ldan pa rtogs par bya'o //
T02D1793-2:116b-24: de las zhes bya ba nas mnyes par 'gyur ro
T02D1793-2:116b-25: zhes pa'i bar du ni mchod pa'i dus dang sbyin
T02D1793-2:116b-26: sreg gi dus su rdo rje 'chang chen po la
T02D1793-2:116b-27: sogs pa'i rnal 'byor pa rnams kyis kha na ma
T02D1793-2:116b-28: tho ba med pa glang po la sogs pa'i sha
T02D1793-2:116b-29: sbyang ba la sogs pa'i rim gyis sbyangs bas dkyil
T02D1793-2:116b-30: 'khor pa rnams tshim pa dang dam tshig gi me
T02D1793-2:116b-31: lha'i zhal nas ye shes kyi me lha tshim pa
T02D1793-2:116b-32: dang / de tshim pas ma gu bar gyur pa
T02D1793-2:116b-33: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis sgrub pa po la
T02D1793-2:116b-34: dngos grub stsol bar 'gyur ro zhes bstan to //
T02D1793-2:116b-35: nyin re zhes bya ba nas zhes bya bar dgongs
T02D1793-2:116b-36: so zhes pa'i bar du ni gsang ba'i dbang bskur
T02D1793-2:116b-38: phyi dang nang dang gsang ba'i mchod pas tshogs kyi 'khor lo bya'o zhes bstan to //
T02D1793-2:116b-39: de yang le'u dang po nas rgyas par bstan pas 'dir ma bshad do //
T02D1793-2:116b-40: bdud rtsi lnga zhes bya ba nas bka' stsal to
T02D1793-2:116b-41: zhes pa'i bar du ni bdud rtsi lnga'i spyod pa'i
T02D1793-2:116b-42: dus su de nyid sbyang ba la sogs pa'i rim
T02D1793-2:116b-44: de'i mthus kyang las dang pa po rnams kyis smod
T02D1793-2:116b-45: pa'i sems bzlog nas rtog pa med pa'i sems kyis
T02D1793-2:117a-2: rdzogs pa'i rim pa la gnas pa'i rang bzhin gyis
T02D1793-2:117a-3: dag pa'i chos thams cad yongs su shes pas smod
T02D1793-2:117a-5: chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis dag pas kyang rang bzhin gyis dag pa'o zhes bshad pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1793-2:117a-6: de yang rigs pa dang lung dag gis sngar bshad zin to //
T02D1793-2:117a-7: 'di ltar zhes bya ba nas go sla'o zhes pa'i
T02D1793-2:117a-8: bar du ni sngags kyi lam gyis zhi ba dang
T02D1793-2:117a-9: rgyas pa dang dbang dang dgug pa dang rnam par
T02D1793-2:117a-10: sdang ba dang / gnas spong ba dang rengs ba
T02D1793-2:117a-11: zhes bya ba 'jig rten pa'i dngos grub brgyad dang
T02D1793-2:117a-12: 'khor lo dang rdo rje dang rin chen dang padma
T02D1793-2:117a-13: dang ral gri dang ri lu dang mig sman dang
T02D1793-2:117a-14: rkang mgyogs la sogs pa dngos grub chen po brgyad
T02D1793-2:117a-15: sdang ba dang / dang / 'jig rten las 'das
T02D1793-2:117a-16: pa'i phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub kyang 'grub par
T02D1793-2:117a-18: pha rol phyin pa'i tshul gyis ni ;
T02D1793-2:117a-19: ; shin tu 'bad pas bsgrub par bya'o //
T02D1793-2:117a-21: pha rol phyin pa'i rnal 'byor pas mthong ba dang
T02D1793-2:117a-22: bsgom pa'i lam gyi rim gyis bskal pa grangs med
T02D1793-2:117a-23: pa gsum gyis byang chub thob par 'gyur ro //
T02D1793-2:117a-25: bshang gcis zhes bya ba nas de skad ces gsungs
T02D1793-2:117a-26: te zhes pa'i bar du ni mar we sho mu
T02D1793-2:117a-27: dang ku go da ha na cha mnyam par byas
T02D1793-2:117a-28: nas btags te thod pa kha sbyar du bzhag nas
T02D1793-2:117a-29: yi ge dgu pa'i sngags kyis byin gyis brlabs nas
T02D1793-2:117a-30: sbyang ba la sogs pa'i rim gyis sbyangs la tshes
T02D1793-2:117a-31: brgyad pa'am bcu bzhi pa'i gang yang rung ba'i zhag
T02D1793-2:117a-32: la yungs kar gyi 'bru'i tshad tsam gyi ri lu
T02D1793-2:117a-33: sum brgya drug cu grib ma la bskam par byas
T02D1793-2:117a-34: nas / nyin re ri lu gcig cig khar bcug
T02D1793-2:117a-35: nas sgom par byed na de'i tshe rig pa 'dzin
T02D1793-2:117a-36: pa dang 'dra bar 'gyur ro zhes bstan to //
T02D1793-2:117a-37: de la zhes bya ba nas bka' bsgo pa'i tshig
T02D1793-2:117a-38: go zhes pa'i bar du ni rnam par snang mdzad
T02D1793-2:117a-39: la sogs pa'i rnal 'byor pa rnams kyis kha dog
T02D1793-2:117a-40: dmar po'i 'od zer lnga'i tshogs dang bcas pa'i yi
T02D1793-2:117a-41: ge hra nam mkha' la bsams te /

T02D1793-2:132b-17: pa ni sku la sogs pa'i bdag nyid yin pas
T02D1793-2:132b-18: so // da rnams kyi mchog ni zhes pa ni 'jig rten skyong ba yin pas na mchog go //
T02D1793-2:132b-19: lha chen po la sogs pa ni 'dod pa'i khams kyi bdag bo'o //
T02D1793-2:132b-20: de rnams kyi mchog ni nyan thos pa dang rang
T02D1793-2:132b-21: rgyal ba rnams so zhes pa ni 'dod chags dang
T02D1793-2:132b-23: de rnams kyi mchog ni rdo rje 'chang chen po
T02D1793-2:132b-24: zhes pa ni thams cad la rjes su ston par
T02D1793-2:132b-25: mdzad pas so // sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo
T02D1793-2:132b-26: rje rnams la zhes pa ni rnam par snang mdzad
T02D1793-2:132b-28: khyad par du dbang bskur bas na zhes pa la 'og nas 'chad pa'i dbang phyug nyid kyis so //
T02D1793-2:132b-29: sku'i dbang phyug ces pa ni phra bal sogs pa la'o //
T02D1793-2:132b-30: gsung gi dbang phyug ces pa ni gzugs bzhi'i bdag nyid do //
T02D1793-2:132b-31: thugs kyi dbang phyug ni lha la sogs pa'i nye bar 'pho ba la sogs pa la'o //
T02D1793-2:132b-32: rdzu 'phrul zhes pa ni 'bar ba dang snang ba la sogs pa la'o //
T02D1793-2:132b-33: kun 'gro ba'i dbang phyug ces pa ni gzugs gcig gis thams cad khyab pa'o //
T02D1793-2:132b-34: ci 'dod ni ji ltar mngon par 'dod pa'i don bskyed pa ste /
T02D1793-2:132b-35: dpag bsam gyi shing bzhin no //
T02D1793-2:132b-36: bskyed pa ni sems can gyi don bya ba'i phyir gzugs sna tshogs pas sprul pa nyid de /
T02D1793-2:132b-37: ro bong stag dang seng ge rnams //
T02D1793-2:133a-0: @133a * // glang po rnams kyi skye gnas so //
T02D1793-2:133a-1: phyag rgya drug kyang skye ba ste /
T02D1793-2:133a-2: rdo rje'i thugs dang ldan pas so //
T02D1793-2:133a-4: yon tan ni stobs bcu dang mi 'jigs pa la sogs pa'o //
T02D1793-2:133a-5: de dag dbang phyug brgyad yin no //
T02D1793-2:133a-6: de dang ldan pas na dbang phyug dam pa'o //
T02D1793-2:133a-7: 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa zhes pa
T02D1793-2:133a-8: ni zhi ba la sogs pa dang 'khor lo'i rig
T02D1793-2:133a-9: pa 'dzin pa la sogs pa'i dngos grub rnams so
T02D1793-2:133a-10: // sgrub par gyur pa zhes pa ni rdzogs par byed pa nyid du thob pa'o //
T02D1793-2:133a-11: rig pa'i rang bzhin zhes pa ni sngags kyi rang bzhin no //
T02D1793-2:133a-12: skyes bu ni lha'i rnam pa can no //
T02D1793-2:133a-13: bskyed pa'i rim pa'o zhes pa ni bskyed pa'i go rims gsungs so //
T02D1793-2:133a-14: nam mkha' rdo rje zhes bya ba nas bcom ldan
T02D1793-2:133a-15: 'das kyis gsungs so zhes pa'i bar du ni khyad
T02D1793-2:133a-16: par gyi gnas la dmigs pa sngon du 'gro bar
T02D1793-2:133a-17: don dam pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi rim pas sems can
T02D1793-2:133a-18: gyi khams stong par byas nas /
T02D1793-2:133a-19: padma la sogs pa rjes su 'jug pas zla ba'i dkyil 'khor 'ba' zhig bsams la /
T02D1793-2:133a-20: de'i steng du dgong pa'i rdo rje dang 'khor lo dang padma dang rin chen dang /
T02D1793-2:133a-21: sna tshogs rdo rje yongs su gyur pa las bskyed pa'i mi bskyod pa dang /
T02D1793-2:133a-25: don yod grub pa'i sku bsams la /
T02D1793-2:133a-26: rnal 'byor gsum gyi rim gyis dang po sbyor ba
T02D1793-2:133a-27: rdzogs te phyag rgya legs par sbyong ba sngon du
T02D1793-2:133a-28: 'gro bar dkyil 'khor spros la des 'gro ba'i don
T02D1793-2:133a-29: byas te / 'khor gyi tshul du bzhag cing las
T02D1793-2:133a-30: kyi rgyal ba mchog la gnas par bya'o zhes bstan
T02D1793-2:133a-31: byas te / to // rnam pa gzhan gyis bsgoms
T02D1793-2:133a-32: na zhes pa ni log pa'am mtshan ma gcig yongs
T02D1793-2:133a-34: dngos grub kyi rgyur mi 'gyur ro zhes pa ni
T02D1793-2:133a-35: mngon bar 'dod pa'i lha'i sgrub pa'i rgyur mi 'gyur
T02D1793-2:133a-36: te mi mthun pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1793-2:133a-37: 'bras ni sa bon la nas kyi myu gu bzhin no //
T02D1793-2:133a-38: des ni bskyed pa'i rim pa'i mtshan ma'i nges pa bstan te rgyas btab pa bzhin no //
T02D1793-2:133a-39: de ltar zhes bya ba nas blta bar bya'o zhes
T02D1793-2:133a-40: pa'i bar du ni dang po sbyor pa'i 'og tu
T02D1793-2:133a-41: ye shes kyi phyag rgya dang snyoms par zhugs pa
T02D1793-2:133b-0: gang la dmigs nas @133b sngar bshad pa'i dkyil 'khor spro bar bya'o zhes bstan to //
T02D1793-2:133b-1: ji ltar 'gyur zhe na zhes bya ba nas brtson
T02D1793-2:133b-2: 'grus kyi brtul ba can zhes pa'i bar du ni
T02D1793-2:133b-3: bskyed pa'i rim pa'i ye shes kyi phyag rgya dang
T02D1793-2:133b-4: snyoms par zhugs pa'i bsgom pas chags pa la sogs
T02D1793-2:133b-5: pa gsum rnam par sbyong ba 'od gsal ba rtogs
T02D1793-2:133b-6: par 'gyur bas / go rims kyis zung du 'jug
T02D1793-2:133b-7: pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas par 'gyur ro zhes
T02D1793-2:133b-8: par 'gyur bas / bstan to // zhag bdun zhes
T02D1793-2:133b-9: bya ba nas sangs rgyas nyid thob par 'gyur ro
T02D1793-2:133b-10: zhes bya ba'i bar du ni gang zhig rnal 'byor
T02D1793-2:133b-11: pa ye shes kyi phyag rgya bsgom par mi nus
T02D1793-2:133b-12: pa des legs par sbyangs pa'i shin tu bslabs pa
T02D1793-2:133b-13: par 'gyur bas / bstan to // / dam tshig
T02D1793-2:133b-14: gi phyag rgya blangs la de dang lhan cig tu
T02D1793-2:133b-15: chags pa la sogs pa'i dbye ba mtshon zhing 'od
T02D1793-2:133b-16: gsal ba rtogs na ji srid zhag bdun gyi bar
T02D1793-2:133b-17: du phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub thob pa de
T02D1793-2:133b-19: dbang po rno ba dang 'dod chags kyi shas che
T02D1793-2:133b-20: ba'i dbang po rno ba'i sgom pa 'di yin no
T02D1793-2:133b-21: // zhes bla ma'i bka' lung ngo //
T02D1793-2:133b-22: dang po sbyor ba'i 'og tu phyag rgya legs par
T02D1793-2:133b-23: sbyang ba ni dkyil 'khor rgyal ba mchog gi phyogs
T02D1793-2:133b-24: gcig yin no // de nas zhes bya ba nas
T02D1793-2:133b-25: 'da' bar mi mdzad do zhes pa'i bar du ni
T02D1793-2:133b-26: rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i rnal 'byor pas lag pa'i phyag
T02D1793-2:133b-27: rgya bcing par mi bya ste /
T02D1793-2:133b-28: de g-yeng bar byed pa yin pas so //
T02D1793-2:133b-29: phyag rgya ni bcom ldan 'das kyi ngo bo mngon du gyur pa'i phyir bcing bar bya ste /
T02D1793-2:133b-30: de nyid mngon su byas nas phyag rgyas ci zhig bya /
T02D1793-2:133b-31: de'i don du glang po rnyed pa zhes bya ba
T02D1793-2:133b-32: ni dpe yin te skyes pa dang glang po stor
T02D1793-2:133b-33: ba gal te de tshol bas mdun du de 'phral
T02D1793-2:133b-34: du rnyed na / de ci'i phyir glang po de'i
T02D1793-2:133b-35: rjes tshol ba de mi tshol te de rnyed pa'i
T02D1793-2:133b-36: du rnyed na / phyir ro // de bzhin du
T02D1793-2:133b-37: gang zhig rnal 'byor pa rang nyid rdo rje sems
T02D1793-2:133b-38: dpa' yin na des lag pa'i phyag rgyal sogs pa
T02D1793-2:133b-39: du rnyed na / phyir ro // / ci'i phyir tshol te de grub pa yin pas so ;
T02D1793-2:133b-40: ; spros pa rnams don med pa'o //
T02D1793-2:133b-41: gsang pa 'dus pa ni rnam pa gnyis la gnas pa'o //
T02D1793-2:133b-42: rtog pa'i rnal 'byor pa rnams kyi zhes pa ni bskyed pa'i rim pa la gnas pa rnams kyi'o //
T02D1793-2:133b-43: sku rdo rje'i rigs dang ldan pa zhes pa ni rnam par snang mdzad kyi rigs dang ldan pa'o //
T02D1793-2:134a-0: @134a * // nyams su blangs pa zhes pa ni sku rdo rje'i dam tshig gsungs ba'o //
T02D1793-2:134a-1: bshang ga ci zhes bya ba la sogs pas bdud
T02D1793-2:134a-2: rtsi la sbyad ba la sogs pa'i rim gyis spyang
T02D1793-2:134a-3: nas bza' bar bya ba dang /
T02D1793-2:134a-4: de bzhin du shes rab la 'khyud pa la sogs
T02D1793-2:134a-5: pas 'byung ba'i byang chub kyi sems kyi bdud rtsis
T02D1793-2:134a-6: lus tshim par byed pa spyad par bya'o zhes sku'i
T02D1793-2:134a-8: bshang bas nye bar mtshon pa'i bdud rtsi'i rang bzhin
T02D1793-2:134a-9: ni rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'o zhes bstan
T02D1793-2:134a-10: to // mchog ni ye shes kyi phyag rgya'o //
T02D1793-2:134a-11: 'bring ni dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o //
T02D1793-2:134a-12: tha ma ni las kyi phyag /
T02D1793-2:134a-14: yang na mchog ni bram ze mo //
T02D1793-2:134a-15: 'bring ni rgyal rigs dang rje rigs ma'o //
T02D1793-2:134a-16: tha ma ni dmangs rigs ma'o //
T02D1793-2:134a-17: yang na mchog ni sme sha can gyi bu mo ste mi bskyod pa'i rigs yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1793-2:134a-18: bar ma ni gar mkhan mo ste 'od dpag tu med pa'i rigs dang ldan pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1793-2:134a-19: tha ma ni khrus mkhan ma ste rnam par snang mdzad kyi rigs yin pas so //
T02D1793-2:134a-20: de dag thugs dang gsung dang sku'i ngo bo yin no //
T02D1793-2:134a-21: khams gsum ni sems can rnams so zhes pa ni khams gsum las bskyed pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1793-2:134a-22: snyoms par zhugs pa'i lam zhes pa ni skye ba byung ba'i sgo'o //
T02D1793-2:134a-23: padma'o zhes pa gru gsum pa mo'i dbang po'o //
T02D1793-2:134a-24: 'gro ba thams cad tshim par byed pa'o zhes pa
T02D1793-2:134a-25: ni sems can gyi rigs rnams la bzhi dga' bar
T02D1793-2:134a-26: byed pa ste / 'dod pa'i khams de'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1793-2:134a-27: dregs pa'i gdugs ni rtsa dbus ma'o //
T02D1793-2:134a-28: zla ba rdzogs pa ni rtsa g-yon pa'o //
T02D1793-2:134a-30: sogs pa ni mdun du lha sbyin ma dang rgyab tu nor rgyas ma'o //
T02D1793-2:134a-31: de dag gal te mi bskyod pa la sogs pa
T02D1793-2:134a-32: bdud rtsi lnga rgyu ba yin na yang de bzhin
T02D1793-2:134a-33: du byang chub kyi sems 'dzag pa yin no //
T02D1793-2:134a-34: pha ga'i dbus na nam mkha' gang //
T02D1793-2:134a-35: nam mkha' lnga yis brgyan pa ste //
T02D1793-2:134a-36: lte bar ge sar dang ldan pa'i //
T02D1793-2:134a-37: 'dab ma brgyad kyis rnam par mdzes //
T02D1793-2:134a-38: de la rtag tu gnas pa ni //
T02D1793-2:134a-39: khu ba'i gzugs su bdud rtsi 'dzag / ces 'byung ngo //
T02D1793-2:134a-40: rtsa lnga po de dag snyoms par zhugs pa'i sngon
T02D1793-2:134b-0: du lag pa'i phyag rgyas bskul @134b zhing gsher bar
T02D1793-2:134b-2: de las 'dzag pa'i bdud rtsi myang ba gang yin
T02D1793-2:134b-3: pa de ni gsung gi rdo rje'i dam tshig ste
T02D1793-2:134b-4: / dag gi rang bzhin lce'i bya ba yin pas so //
T02D1793-2:134b-5: de ni dkyil 'khor rgyal ba mchog gi phyogs gcig
T02D1793-2:134b-6: dang shes rab kyi dbang bskur gyi phyogs gcig dang
T02D1793-2:134b-7: / gsang ba'i dbang bskur yang yin no zhes bstan to //
T02D1793-2:134b-8: de nas zhes bya ba nas sdud par byed pa'i
T02D1793-2:134b-9: tshig go zhes pa ni thugs rdo rje'i rnal 'byor
T02D1793-2:134b-10: pas padma can la sogs pa'i phyag rgya dang lhan
T02D1793-2:134b-11: cig tu rol pas de rnams kyi sems mnyes par
T02D1793-2:134b-12: mi bya ba'o // 'on kyang phyi'i kha zas dang
T02D1793-2:134b-13: btung ba dang tshig snyan pa la sogs pas mgu
T02D1793-2:134b-14: mi bya ba'o // bar byas te / de nas dga' bar 'gyur ba'i sems dang ldan pas /
T02D1793-2:134b-15: bde ba'i lus dang ldan pa de rnams kyis byang chub kyi sems ster bar 'gyur ro //
T02D1793-2:134b-16: gang gi dbang gis bde ba chen po myong ba yin no zhes bstan to //
T02D1793-2:134b-17: de ni thugs kyi dam tshig ste thugs mnyes par byed pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1793-2:134b-18: spyod pa gsum la gnas pa'i rnal 'byor pa zhes
T02D1793-2:134b-19: pa ni spros pa dang bcas pa la sogs pa
T02D1793-2:134b-21: spyi'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' mngon par
T02D1793-2:134b-22: zhes pa zhes pa ni de rnams la kun du
T02D1793-2:134b-23: chag pa'o // brtsal bar bya ba'i phyir ni de ldog par bya ba'i phyir ro //
T02D1793-2:134b-24: lhag ma'i lha bstan pa'i lha'i ngo bo nyid bstan pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1793-2:134b-25: de nas zhes bya ba nas de skad ces bka'
T02D1793-2:134b-26: stsal to zhes pa'i bar du ni gang zhig so
T02D1793-2:134b-27: sor nges pa'i rang bzhin la dmigs nas so sor
T02D1793-2:134b-28: snang ba'i phung po lnga dang /
T02D1793-2:134b-29: mig la sogs pa'i skye mched drug dang /
T02D1793-2:134b-30: sa la sogs pa 'byung ba chen po gang yin
T02D1793-2:134b-31: pa de rnams rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa
T02D1793-2:134b-32: de bzhin gshegs pa lnga dang /
T02D1793-2:134b-33: spyan ma la sogs pa dang rdo rje 'chang chen
T02D1793-2:134b-34: po dang sa'i snying po la sogs pa drug gi
T02D1793-2:134b-35: rang bzhin du shes par bya'o zhes bstan to //
T02D1793-2:134b-36: de nye bar mtshon pa tsam yin te ye shes
T02D1793-2:134b-37: lnga dang yul drug gi ngo bo yang yin par
T02D1793-2:134b-38: shes par bya'o // de yang rigs brgya'i dbye bas sngar gtan la phab pa'o //
T02D1793-2:134b-40: bdag nyid sangs rgyas kun nyid de //
T02D1793-2:134b-41: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad nyid //
T02D1793-2:135a-2: rang gi bdag nyid mchod par bya //
T02D1793-2:135a-4: le'u dang po nas rdo rje phreng ba'i rgyud kyi tshad mas /
T02D1793-2:135a-5: sku'i dkyil 'khor de nyid bstan to //
T02D1793-2:135a-7: byang chub sems kyi dkyil 'khor dang /
T02D1793-2:135a-8: sku yi dkyil 'khor nyid dang ni //
T02D1793-2:135a-9: bha ga'i dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba'i //
T02D1793-2:135a-10: dkyil 'khor gsum po de dag brtags //
T02D1793-2:135a-11: de yang bskyed pa'i rim pa'i dang po sbyor ba'i
T02D1793-2:135a-12: phyogs gcig shin tu rnal 'byor zhes bya ba yin
T02D1793-2:135a-13: no // dkyil 'khor rgyal ba mchog la yang sku'i
T02D1793-2:135a-14: dkyil 'khor la lhag par mos pa sngon du 'gro
T02D1793-2:135a-15: bar phyi rol tu dkyil 'khor spro ba'o //
T02D1793-2:135a-16: de ltar zhes bya ba nas bzhugs par gyur to zhes ba'i bar du ni /
T02D1793-2:135a-17: phung po dang khams dang skye mchid kyi rang bzhin rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i tshogs /
T02D1793-2:135a-18: rang gi phung po la sogs pa dang mtshungs par
T02D1793-2:135a-19: shes nas khams gsum pa yang de'i ngo bor shes
T02D1793-2:135a-20: par bya ste / gnas ji lta ba bzhin du
T02D1793-2:135a-21: gnas pa'i dkyil 'khor pa rnams gzigs nas sems rnam
T02D1793-2:135a-22: par dag pa'i rim pa 'am mngon par byang chub
T02D1793-2:135a-24: 'khor gyis zhus pa la klags skabs su sbyin pa'i phyir ro zhes bstan to //
T02D1793-2:135a-25: bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba nas shes par bgyi
T02D1793-2:135a-26: zhes pa'i bar du ni bcom ldan 'das rdo rje
T02D1793-2:135a-27: 'chang 'od gsal ba la 'jug na dpal gsang ba
T02D1793-2:135a-28: 'dus pa rdo rje slob dpon khyod dang bdag cag
T02D1793-2:135a-29: gis ji ltar shes bar bya zhes byams pas de
T02D1793-2:135a-30: bzhin gshegs pa rnams la 'dri bar byas so zhes
T02D1793-2:135a-31: bstan to // 'dir 'jig rten gyi spyod pa ni
T02D1793-2:135a-32: dkyil 'khor gyi chog dang sbyin sreg dang rab tu
T02D1793-2:135a-33: gnas pa dang zhi ba la sogs pa'i spyod pa'o
T02D1793-2:135a-34: bstan to // // 'jig rten las 'das pa'i spyod
T02D1793-2:135a-35: pa ni dam tshig la sogs pa dang rdzogs pa'i
T02D1793-2:135a-37: byams pas bskul ba zhes pa ni 'dri bar byas pa'o //
T02D1793-2:135a-38: sa'i snying po la sogs pa gnas kyang byams pas
T02D1793-2:135a-39: bskul ba ni ma 'ongs chos kyi rgyal srid la
T02D1793-2:135a-41: ston pa po zhes pa ni 'dir dbang bskur ba'i rdo rje slob dpon no //
T02D1793-2:135b-0: rdo rje 'chang chen po dang 'dra ba @135b zhes
T02D1793-2:135b-1: pa ni 'dra ba'i sgra gzhan gyi 'brel pa dang
T02D1793-2:135b-2: rnam par gcod pa yin te /
T02D1793-2:135b-3: des na rdo rje sems dpa' nyid de yin gyi de bzhin gshegs pa gzhan ni ma yin no //
T02D1793-2:135b-4: khyad par gyi sgo nas dam tshig bstan pa'i don du bshad par bya ste /
T02D1793-2:135b-5: de ci'i phyir zhe na zhes smos te /
T02D1793-2:135b-6: byang chub kyi sems zhes pa ni stong pa nyid
T02D1793-2:135b-7: dang snying rje dbyer med pa'i bdag nyid ni rdo
T02D1793-2:135b-8: rje 'chang ngo // stong nyid snying rje dbyer med pa'i //
T02D1793-2:135b-9: byang chub sems de bshad pa yin //
T02D1793-2:135b-11: gnyis su med pa'i ye shes 'dzin pas na rdo rje 'chang ngo //
T02D1793-2:135b-12: de bzhin gshegs thams cad kyi gtso bo yin pas na chen po yang yin la /
T02D1793-2:135b-13: gnyis su med pa'i ye shes kyi rang bzhin pas
T02D1793-2:135b-14: rdo rje 'chang yang yin te zhes rdo rje 'chang
T02D1793-2:135b-15: chen po'o // slob dpon zhes bya ba ni dpal 'dus pa las dbang bskur ba'i bla ma'o //
T02D1793-2:135b-16: shes pa dang shes bya'i bag chags kyis mi g-yo bas na mi bskyod pa ste /
T02D1793-2:135b-17: rdo rje sems dpa' nyid do //
T02D1793-2:135b-18: de dag ni rdo rje 'chang gi rnam grangs kho na'o //
T02D1793-2:135b-19: dbyer med pa ni rdo rje 'chang dang slob dpon tha mi dad pa'o //
T02D1793-2:135b-22: de'i drin gyis de'i go 'phang thob pa'o //
T02D1793-2:135b-23: de nyid kyi phyir rgyu dang 'bras bu de dag
T02D1793-2:135b-24: dbyer med par byas nas slob dpon dang rdo rje
T02D1793-2:135b-26: rigs kyi bu zhes pa ni ma 'ongs pa'i dus
T02D1793-2:135b-27: su sangs rgyas kyi yul las 'byung ba'i 'gro ba'i
T02D1793-2:135b-28: slob dpon no // shar la sogs pa'i phyogs na
T02D1793-2:135b-29: gnas pa zhes pa ni de la srid pa'i rtse
T02D1793-2:135b-31: rnam par snang mdzad kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'og min no //
T02D1793-2:135b-32: de'i lho phyogs su rin chen 'byung gnas ni rin chen 'byung ldan gyi 'jig rten gyi khams so //
T02D1793-2:135b-33: de'i nub phyogs su bde ba can zhes bya ba
T02D1793-2:135b-34: 'od dpag tu med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams so
T02D1793-2:135b-35: // de'i byang phyogs su me tog can zhes bya
T02D1793-2:135b-36: ba don yod grub pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams so
T02D1793-2:135b-37: // // de rnams kyi dbus su nam mkha' la
T02D1793-2:135b-38: mngon par dga' ba zhes bya ba mi bskyod pa'i
T02D1793-2:135b-40: de dang 'dra ba yang stong gsum dang stong chen
T02D1793-2:135b-41: po la sogs pa la ltos nas mtha' yas pa'i
T02D1793-2:136a-2: grangs med pa na zhes smos te /
T02D1793-2:136a-3: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' grangs med pa
T02D1793-2:136a-4: zhes bya ba ni rdzogs pa dang ma rdzogs pa'i
T02D1793-2:136a-6: chos kyi sku zhes pa ni khyab pa med pa'i chos nyid kyi ngo bos so //
T02D1793-2:136a-7: mi g-yo bas na zhes bya ba ni ngo bo nyid kyi rtag pas so //
T02D1793-2:136a-8: longs spyod rdzogs pa'i skus zhes pa ni mtshan dang dpe byed kyis brgyan pa'i skus so //
T02D1793-2:136a-9: 'og min gyi gnas zhes pa ni nye bar mtshon pa tsam yin te /
T02D1793-2:136a-10: mngon par dga' ba la sogs pa la sogs pa la yang ngo //
T02D1793-2:136a-11: ston par mdzad pas zhes pa ni chos kyi bdud rtsi myang bas so //
T02D1793-2:136a-12: rgyun mi 'chang par zhes pa ni tshim par byed pa ste /
T02D1793-2:136a-13: mi 'jig rten pa'i rtag pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1793-2:136a-14: sprul pa'i skus zhes pa ni spros pa'i 'khor gyis so //
T02D1793-2:136a-17: de dag bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs bstan
T02D1793-2:136a-18: pas thab par mdzad pa ni sems can rnams thob
T02D1793-2:136a-20: rgyun gyi rtag pas na sprul pa'i su ni rtag pa yin no //
T02D1793-2:136a-21: de rnams zhes bya ba nas rang gi sangs rgyas
T02D1793-2:136a-22: kyi zhing du 'gro zhing zhes pa'i bar du ni
T02D1793-2:136a-23: da lta bu'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpas
T02D1793-2:136a-24: gsang ba 'dus pa'i slob dpon la phyi'i mchod pa
T02D1793-2:136a-25: dang rang gi nang gi mchod pa la sogs pas
T02D1793-2:136a-26: dus gsum du mchod par mdzad do //
T02D1793-2:136a-28: 'di skad du zhes bya ba nas go sla'o zhes
T02D1793-2:136a-29: pa'i bar du ni rdo rje slob dpon 'di bdag
T02D1793-2:136a-30: cag gi pha 'di bya ba ste /
T02D1793-2:136a-31: sangs rgyas kyi theg pa rgyun ma chad par byed
T02D1793-2:136a-32: pas so zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i bstod pa'i
T02D1793-2:136a-33: tshig brjod nas / yar ldog cing rang rang gi
T02D1793-2:136a-34: sangs rgyas kyi zhing du gshegs so zhes bstan to
T02D1793-2:136a-35: tshig brjod nas / // 'jigs shing zhes bya ba
T02D1793-2:136a-36: nas mi smra bar gyur to zhes pa'i bar du
T02D1793-2:136a-37: mchod par bya ba la the tshom ci dgos zhes
T02D1793-2:136a-38: bya bas ngo tsha dang bcas pa'i phyir byams pa
T02D1793-2:136a-39: cad mi smra bar gyur to zhes bstan to //
T02D1793-2:136a-40: de ltar byams pa zhes bya ba nas pos so
T02D1793-2:136a-41: zhes pa'i bar du ni dkyil 'khor gyi bdag pos
T02D1793-2:136a-42: brgyan pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas
T02D1793-2:136b-0: / rdo rje @136b 'chang chen po'i ngo bo khong
T02D1793-2:136b-1: du chung nas de bzhin gshegs pa rnams slar yang
T02D1793-2:136b-2: ston par mdzad de zhes bstan to //
T02D1793-2:136b-3: de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhes bya ba nas shes par
T02D1793-2:136b-4: bya ba'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i bar du ni
T02D1793-2:136b-5: bcom ldan 'das kyis sprul pa'i sku gang yin pa
T02D1793-2:136b-6: de ni gang du gnas zhes byang chub sems dpa'
T02D1793-2:136b-7: zhu bar byas nas rgyud kyi dkyil 'khor bdag po
T02D1793-2:136b-8: mi bskyod pa gang yin pa de'i sku la sogs
T02D1793-2:136b-10: de nyid las de rnams spro ba yin no zhes
T02D1793-2:136b-11: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis lan btab pa dang
T02D1793-2:136b-12: gzhan yang dkyil 'khor gyi bdag po'i sku la sogs
T02D1793-2:136b-13: pa gang du gnas zhes zhus pa la gang du
T02D1793-2:136b-14: yang mi gnas so zhes lan btab pa dang /
T02D1793-2:136b-15: 'od gsal ba zhes brjod par rigs na rang gi
T02D1793-2:136b-16: rig pa yin pas brjod par mi nus so zhes
T02D1793-2:136b-17: bya ba gang du yang ni gnas so zhes bstan
T02D1793-2:136b-18: to // de ni ji ltar thob ce na bla
T02D1793-2:136b-19: ma'i man ngag las shes par bya ba'i phyir ro
T02D1793-2:136b-20: zhes pa ni shes rab ye shes kyi dbang bskur
T02D1793-2:136b-21: ba'i dus su bla ma'i zhal las 'od gsal ba
T02D1793-2:136b-23: des ni rdo rje slob dpon gyi bka' drin gyis
T02D1793-2:136b-24: gang gi tshe rdo rje 'chang chen po'i go 'phang
T02D1793-2:136b-25: 'od gsal ba dang phyag rgya chen po'i rnam grangs
T02D1793-2:136b-26: thob na de'i tshe rgyu dang 'bras bu dbyer med
T02D1793-2:136b-27: pas de nyid rdo rje 'chang chen po yin no
T02D1793-2:136b-28: zhes bstan to // de ltar zhes bya ba nas
T02D1793-2:136b-29: 'di'i don ston pa yin no zhes pa'i bar du
T02D1793-2:136b-30: ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams ston pa rdo rje
T02D1793-2:136b-31: slob dpon la ngo mtshar du gyur pa dang /
T02D1793-2:136b-32: rdo rje 'chang gi go 'phang gi de rgyur gyur pa la rmad du gyur pa dang /
T02D1793-2:136b-33: de bzhin du rdo rje slob dpon sangs rgyas la
T02D1793-2:136b-34: sogs pas bsnyen bkur du bya ba nyid du bstan
T02D1793-2:136b-35: to // de yang 'grel pa mkhan gyis go sla bas na ma bshad do //
T02D1793-2:136b-36: don 'di zhes bya ba la sogs pas dpal sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i tshad ma nyid bstan to //
T02D1793-2:136b-37: slob dpon ni rdo rje slob dpon no ;
T02D1793-2:136b-38: ; de ji ltar blta zhe na /
T02D1793-2:136b-39: zhes pa ni ji ltar shes par bya ste zhes 'dri ba la lan no //
T02D1793-2:136b-40: yon tan gyi tshogs dang ldan pas na bla ma'o //
T02D1793-2:136b-41: sangs rgyas thams cad nye bar sdud par byed pas
T02D1793-2:136b-42: na sangs rgyas thams cad ste de dang mtshungs pa'o
T02D1793-2:136b-43: // rdo rje 'chang ni mi bskyod pa'o //
T02D1793-2:137a-1: thams cad pa yin pas na /
T02D1793-2:137a-2: kun ni don yod grub pa'o //
T02D1793-2:137a-3: rgyal po ni 'od dpag tu med pa'o //
T02D1793-2:137a-4: rin chen tog ni rin chen 'byung ldan no //
T02D1793-2:137a-5: de bzhin gshegs pa ni rnam par snang mdzad do //
T02D1793-2:137a-6: de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa lnga dang pa drug
T02D1793-2:137a-7: pa rdo rje 'chang gi ngo bo rdo rje slob
T02D1793-2:137a-8: dpon bstan to // de ltar gyur pa'i slob dpon
T02D1793-2:137a-9: ni rdo rje bla ma'i yon tan ni tshul khrims
T02D1793-2:137a-10: la sogs pa'i yon tan gzung bar bya'o //
T02D1793-2:137a-11: skyon ni gang yang rung ba'i spyod pa ngan pa gzung bar mi bya ba'o //
T02D1793-2:137a-13: yon tan gyis ni dngos grub cing //
T02D1793-2:137a-15: 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dngos grub tu 'gyur ro //
T02D1793-2:137a-16: skyon ni yod pa'am med pa bzung ba na sngar bshad pa'i dngos grub nyams par 'gyur ro //
T02D1793-2:137a-17: de'i phyir ni rgyu de las so //
T02D1793-2:137a-19: zhes pa ni lus dag yid kyis so //
T02D1793-2:137a-20: sangs rgyas nyid ni 'bras bu ste thob par byed pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1793-2:137a-21: de 'dod pa ni de don du gnyer ba'i skyes bu rnams kyis so //
T02D1793-2:137a-22: dad pas ni dang pa dang ldan pas so //
T02D1793-2:137a-23: de ni rdo rje slob dpon no //
T02D1793-2:137a-24: mchod cing ni mchod par bya'o //
T02D1793-2:137a-25: gang gi phyir bsam pas 'bras bu ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi mtshan nyid do //
T02D1793-2:137a-26: smin byed pa ni ster bar byed pa de'i phyir mchod par bya'o //
T02D1793-2:137a-27: de bzhin du rin chen rgyal po zhes bya ba
T02D1793-2:137a-28: la sogs pas mdo sde tshad ma nyid du bstan
T02D1793-2:137a-29: to // au rgyan gyi ri ni byang phyogs kyi gnas kyi ri la'o //
T02D1793-2:137a-30: bcom ldan 'das lag na rdo rje zhes pa ni
T02D1793-2:137a-31: rdo rje 'chang chen po de la bzhugs par gyur
T02D1793-2:137a-32: nas 'khor rnams la 'di skad gsungs so //
T02D1793-2:137a-33: rdo rje theg pa la slob par byed pa ni kye byang chub sems dpa' rnams so //
T02D1793-2:137a-34: de bzhin gshegs pa ni bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas so //
T02D1793-2:137a-35: de re zhig yongs su mya ngan las 'das pas
T02D1793-2:137a-36: ston pa ni mi mthong na yang mngon sum du
T02D1793-2:137a-37: mi mthong pa'o // de bas na rdo rje slob
T02D1793-2:137a-38: dpon ni 'jig rten pa la ston par 'gyur te
T02D1793-2:137a-39: mi mthong pa'o // / des de'i ngo bo bstan ba'i phyir ro //
T02D1793-2:137a-40: rje btsun stong phrag brgya pa las kyang bya ba
T02D1793-2:137a-41: 'dis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las
T02D1793-2:137b-0: kyang lung tshad ma nyid @137b bstan te /
T02D1793-2:137b-1: sangs rgyas kyi byang chub ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub po //
T02D1793-2:137b-3: de thob par byed pa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen te /
T02D1793-2:137b-5: nye bar bsten pa zhes pa ni de la brten nas so //
T02D1793-2:137b-6: de nas zhes bya ba nas gsungs te zhes pa'i
T02D1793-2:137b-7: bar du ni bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang chen
T02D1793-2:137b-8: pos dang po 'od gsal ba la bzhugs nas de
T02D1793-2:137b-9: nas cig car du bdag la byin gyi brlabs pa'i
T02D1793-2:137b-11: mi bskyod pa phyung zhing rjes su zhugs nas zhe sdang rdo rjer gyur nas /
T02D1793-2:137b-12: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ro mnyam pa'i bdag nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin la zhugs te /
T02D1793-2:137b-13: ting nge 'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor nyan pa'i dus su de bzhin gshegs pa rnams pos so //
T02D1793-2:137b-14: de rnams kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi rjes su gzung
T02D1793-2:137b-15: ba'i gsung gis mgu bas bcom ldan 'das ston cig
T02D1793-2:137b-16: ces bya ba'i de'i tshig gsan nas de ston pa'i
T02D1793-2:137b-17: phyir rtsom par gyur to zhes bstan to //
T02D1793-2:137b-18: nam mkha'i khams zhes bya ba nas bsam gtan gyi
T02D1793-2:137b-19: dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba'i du ni re zhig dang
T02D1793-2:137b-20: po rnal 'byor pas bdag la byin gyis brlabs pa'i
T02D1793-2:137b-21: rim pas bdag nyid rdo rje 'chang chen por bsgoms
T02D1793-2:137b-22: la mi bskyod pa phyung zhing rjes su zhugs nas
T02D1793-2:137b-24: de nyid phung po lnga'i bdag nyid de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i bdag nyid dang /
T02D1793-2:137b-25: spyan ma la sogs pa'i rang bzhin gyi khams bzhi'i ngo bo sku nyid dkyil 'khor du bsams la /
T02D1793-2:137b-26: rim pa de nyid dkyil 'khor pa rnams kyang gnas
T02D1793-2:137b-27: ji lta ba bzhin du 'khor gyi tshul du bsams
T02D1793-2:137b-28: te / rang gi snying ga'i padma'i lte bar rdo rje 'chad chen po bsams la /
T02D1793-2:137b-29: reg bya rdo rje mas 'khyud pa'i snyoms par zhugs pa'i bde ba myong zhing de'i padma'i nang du /
T02D1793-2:137b-30: lha sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis dkyil 'khor gyi bdag
T02D1793-2:137b-31: nyid bsgoms la de'i dbus kyi lte bar mi bskyod
T02D1793-2:137b-32: pa'i gzugs can slob ma la bcug nas snyoms par
T02D1793-2:137b-33: zhugs pa las bzhugs pa'i rtsa'i 'khor lo nas 'dzag
T02D1793-2:137b-34: pa byang chub kyi sems kyi rgyun gyi char dang
T02D1793-2:138a-0: / de bzhin du srog dang rtsol ba la gnas pa'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems @138a * //
T02D1793-2:138a-1: dpa' dang snyoms par zhugs pa de rnams slob ma de'i spyi bor dbang bskur sbyin par bya'o //
T02D1793-2:138a-2: dbang bskur ba 'di ni rang dang gzhan gyi don
T02D1793-2:138a-3: phun sum tshogs pa rdzogs pa la nus pa yin
T02D1793-2:138a-5: 'di ni rig pa'i dbang bskur ba yin te /
T02D1793-2:138a-6: rig ma'i padma'i nang du rtsol bas so //
T02D1793-2:138a-7: gsang ba'i dbang bskur ba yang yin te /
T02D1793-2:138a-8: byang chub kyi sems kyis dbang bskur bas so //
T02D1793-2:138a-9: shes rab kyi dbang bskur yang yin te /
T02D1793-2:138a-10: shes rab kyi padma dang reg pas so //
T02D1793-2:138a-11: bla na med pa'i de kho na nyid thob pa
T02D1793-2:138a-12: bzhi pa yang ni de bzhin no zhes shes par
T02D1793-2:138a-13: bya'o // gzhan yang gdug pa rnams zhes bya ba nas /
T02D1793-2:138a-14: sbyor ba phul du byung ba'o //
T02D1793-2:138a-15: zhes pa'i bar du ni le'u bcu gsum pa dang
T02D1793-2:138a-16: bcu bzhi pa'i yan lag tu gyur pa'i cho ga
T02D1793-2:138a-17: 'dis drag po'i las bsgom par bya ste /
T02D1793-2:138a-18: re zhig dang po rnal 'byor pas rang gi bdag
T02D1793-2:138a-19: nyid pags pa dang dus pa dang sha tha dad
T02D1793-2:138a-20: par bsgoms la yang gcig dang du ma bral bas
T02D1793-2:138a-21: de nyid stong par bsgoms te /
T02D1793-2:138a-22: rkang pa'i dkyil 'khor nas mgo bo'i bar //
T02D1793-2:138a-23: bshang gci sogs kyis rab tu gang //
T02D1793-2:138a-24: rdul phra ba sogs dbye ba yis //
T02D1793-2:138a-25: rnam par dpyad na ngo bo med //
T02D1793-2:138a-26: ces bya ba'i tshig gis de'i 'og tu lus ngag
T02D1793-2:138a-27: yid kyi bdag nyid yi ge gsum thams cad nag
T02D1793-2:138a-28: po'o // h'um hrim kham zhes bya ba'i 'od zer gyi tshogs spro bar byas la /
T02D1793-2:138a-29: de yongs su gyur pa las byung ba'i kha dog
T02D1793-2:138a-30: sngon po drag po rdo rje spro ba dang bsdu
T02D1793-2:138a-31: ba'i rim gyis / de yongs su gyur pa las
T02D1793-2:138a-32: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje mkha' 'gro zhal gcig phyag
T02D1793-2:138a-33: bzhi pa kha dog sngon po g-yon brkyang ba gdug
T02D1793-2:138a-35: phyag g-yas pa la rtse gsum /
T02D1793-2:138a-37: g-yon pa'i dang po la thod pa gnyis pa la
T02D1793-2:138a-38: mdud rtse gcig pa rdo rje phur bu 'dzin pa
T02D1793-2:138a-39: bsams la / lce yang rtse lda'i rdo rje'i rnam pa can /
T02D1793-2:138a-40: lce re rer rlung la sogs pa 'byung ba chen
T02D1793-2:138a-41: po'i sa bon la ya ra la wa ha'i sa
T02D1793-2:138a-42: bon bkod nas de las byung pa'i 'od zer ldas
T02D1793-2:138a-43: bsgrub bya'i yan lag la sdig pa bzhin du zhugs
T02D1793-2:138a-44: par sbyar bas khrag ma lus pa dgug cing /
T02D1793-2:138a-45: rang gi snying gar 'jug par bya'o //
T02D1793-2:138b-0: de'i tshe dgra bo 'chi bar 'gyur ba @138b dang
T02D1793-2:138b-1: gzhan yang ting nge 'dzin de nyid kyis bsgrub bya'i
T02D1793-2:138b-2: snying ga rtse gsum gyis dral la /
T02D1793-2:138b-3: rdo rjes 'og dang rdo rje phur bus yan lag thams cad kyi tshigs dral la /
T02D1793-2:138b-4: sngar bshad pa'i sa bon lnga po'i 'od zer gyis
T02D1793-2:138b-5: yan lag thams cad la khyab pa'i khrag dgug cing
T02D1793-2:138b-6: thod pa la bzhag ste de las btung bar bya'o//
T02D1793-2:138b-7: de'i tshe dgra bo 'chi bar 'gyur ro /
T02D1793-2:138b-9: de nas zhes bya ba nas /
T02D1793-2:138b-10: 'di ni nang gi sbyin sreg go //
T02D1793-2:138b-11: zhes pa'i bar du ni kha zas kyi dus su
T02D1793-2:138b-12: rnal 'byor pas bza' ba dang btung ba la sogs
T02D1793-2:138b-13: pa bdud rtsi lnga'i chogs bskyed la snying gar ye
T02D1793-2:138b-14: shes sems pa me lce spro ba bsams la /
T02D1793-2:138b-15: mgrin par padma 'dab ma brgyad pa dang 'dra ba'i
T02D1793-2:138b-16: lce'i padma'i 'dab man dang 'dra ba yang kha yang
T02D1793-2:138b-18: lag pa gnyis dgang gzar dang blugs gzar du bsams te spyad par bya'o zhes bstan to //
T02D1793-2:138b-19: 'dir nye bar dgos pa'i bza' ba dang btung ba
T02D1793-2:138b-20: dkyil 'khor bzhis dbye bar byas pa sha dang khu
T02D1793-2:138b-21: bla sogs pa'i rang bzhin ni khams nyi shu rtsa
T02D1793-2:138b-22: bzhi'i ngo bor yongs su gyur par bsam par bya'o
T02D1793-2:138b-23: // lhag ma zhes bya ba ni yongs su gyur pa las 'byung ba'o //
T02D1793-2:138b-24: bshad pa dang gci ba'i dngos por zhes pa ni
T02D1793-2:138b-25: me yongs su gtong pa'i thal ba'i ngo bor yongs
T02D1793-2:138b-26: su gyur par bsam par bya'o //
T02D1793-2:138b-27: lha mo bzhis yongs su zhus pa'i rgyud las kyang /
T02D1793-2:138b-28: rlung gis me ni sbar bya ba //
T02D1793-2:138b-29: chus ni yongs su smin par byed //
T02D1793-2:138b-30: dbang chen gyis ni dkyil 'khor gnas //
