T02D1793-2:141b-28: nye bar thob pa zhes pa ni snang ba nye bar thob pa'i ye shes so //
T02D1793-2:141b-29: mthar thug ba zhes pa ni 'od gsal ba'i mthar thug pa bstan pas so //
T02D1793-2:141b-30: kye byang chub sems dpa' rnams de ltar ma sems
T02D1793-2:141b-31: shig / sangs rgyas kyi sa thob pa yang dag
T02D1793-2:141b-32: par rdzogs pa'i byang chub dang ldan pa ni bdag
T02D1793-2:141b-33: cag gis kyang shin tu zab pa yin pas mi
T02D1793-2:141b-34: rtogs na / khyed rnams kyis thob pa de smos
T02D1793-2:141b-35: ci dgos zhes bya ba de lta bu de bzhin
T02D1793-2:141b-36: gshegs pa'i dbugs dbyung ba thos nas byang chub sems
T02D1793-2:141b-37: dpa' rnams kyang mi smra bar 'gyur to zhes bstan
T02D1793-2:141b-38: rtogs na / to // dgongs pa yin pas bshad
T02D1793-2:141b-39: pa zhes bya ba ni shin tu gsal ba'i de
T02D1793-2:141b-40: kho na nyid bstan pas so //
T02D1793-2:142a-0: de ltar zhes bya ba nas 'di'i don @142a * //
T02D1793-2:142a-1: bshad zin to zhes pa'i bar du ni dkyil 'khor
T02D1793-2:142a-2: ma lus pa sku la sogs pa'i rang bzhin gyi
T02D1793-2:142a-4: yi ge gnyis po yang yi ge h'um tsam las
T02D1793-2:142a-5: zhugs nas bdag gis bya ba byas so zhes dgongs
T02D1793-2:142a-6: pas snyoms pa'i bde ba'i dbang gis bcom ldan 'das
T02D1793-2:142a-7: 'od gsal ba la 'jug go zhes bstan to //
T02D1793-2:142a-8: de ltar zhes bya ba nas gsan par mdzod cig
T02D1793-2:142a-9: ces bya ba dgongs so zhes pa'i bar du ni
T02D1793-2:142a-10: thog ma nas grub pa'i tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi'i ngo
T02D1793-2:142a-11: bo spyan ma la sogs pas /
T02D1793-2:142a-12: ji ltar bcom ldan 'das thim par gyur pa las bskul bar mdzad pa de bstan to //
T02D1793-2:142a-13: de ni las kyi rgyal ba mchog gi ting nge 'dzin to //
T02D1793-2:142a-14: 'dir de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po
T02D1793-2:142a-15: yin pas na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni
T02D1793-2:142a-16: rnam par snang mdzad de dang por gyur pas so
T02D1793-2:142a-17: // spyan dga' ba zhes pa ni 'khyud pa la dga' ba'o //
T02D1793-2:142a-18: drug ldan la sogs pa zhes pa ni dbyangs kyi khyad par gyis so //
T02D1793-2:142a-19: sgeg cing ni 'jam pa'i dbyangs so //
T02D1793-2:142a-20: de dang bcas pa ni snyan pa'i dbyangs te tshig snyan pa de rnams kyis so //
T02D1793-2:142a-21: sems can thams cad ces bya ba ni sa'i khams
T02D1793-2:142a-22: kyi rang bzhin nam sems can nam snod kyi 'jig
T02D1793-2:142a-23: rten gyi rang bzhin te de'i bdag nyid ni rnam
T02D1793-2:142a-24: par snang mdzad de gzugs kyi phung po rnam par
T02D1793-2:142a-26: khams gsum zhes pa ni 'dod pa la sogs pa la'o //
T02D1793-2:142a-27: chos kyi rgyal srid ni gti mug rnam par dag pa thob pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1793-2:142a-28: mdun ma gnas pa zhes bya ba ni chags pa che bas mdun du bzhugs pa bzhin no //
T02D1793-2:142a-29: thugs dbang du gyur pa mnyes pa zhes pa ni
T02D1793-2:142a-30: me long lta bu'i ye shes kyi thugs kyi rang
T02D1793-2:142a-32: rol pa ni snyoms par zhugs pa'o //
T02D1793-2:142a-33: tshim par byed pa ni dga' bar byed pas so //
T02D1793-2:142a-34: dga' ba yid 'ong zhes pa ni 'od gsal ba'o //
T02D1793-2:142a-35: skyed pas ni de byed pa'o //
T02D1793-2:142a-36: 'khyud pa la sogs pa zhes pa ni tsum ba la sogs pas so //
T02D1793-2:142a-37: sems can thams cad skyed pa'i rgyud ces pa ni sems can gyi rigs bzhi'i rgyur gyur bas so //
T02D1793-2:142a-38: thams cad kyi gzhi nis yin pas gzhi'am rgyu nyid do //
T02D1793-2:142b-0: phan pa dang bde ba byed pas @142b zhes pa
T02D1793-2:142b-1: ni mthong ba dang mi mthong ba'i bde ba ster
T02D1793-2:142b-3: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi nad na thugs
T02D1793-2:142b-4: kyi ngo bo yin pas thugs ni mi bskyod pa'o
T02D1793-2:142b-5: // chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes kyi ngo bo
T02D1793-2:142b-6: yin pas 'phags pa yang yin la m'a ma k'i
T02D1793-2:142b-7: yang yin pas 'phags pa m'a ma k'i'o //
T02D1793-2:142b-8: tha mal pa ma yin pa zhes pa ni lha'i
T02D1793-2:142b-9: rnam pa'i bsgom pas na khyad par dang ldan pa
T02D1793-2:142b-10: ste / 'dod chags kyi rnam par dag pa bskyed pa'o //
T02D1793-2:142b-11: dga' ba ni snyoms par zhugs pa'o //
T02D1793-2:142b-12: zhugs pa ste zhes pa ni spyod pa'am rdzogs pa'o //
T02D1793-2:142b-13: mi 'jig pa'i sku dang ldan pa'i phyir ro zhes pa ni rdo rje'i sku yin pas so //
T02D1793-2:142b-14: bka'i 'khor lo ni sprul ba'i sku spro ba'o //
T02D1793-2:142b-15: de skor bar mdzad pa ni skyed par mdzad pas
T02D1793-2:142b-16: sems can mang po la phan pa rjes su brtse
T02D1793-2:142b-18: phung po lnga zhas pa ni de rnam par dag pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1793-2:142b-19: kun rdzob kyi bden pa zhes pa ni sems rnam
T02D1793-2:142b-20: par dag pa'i rim pas sbyor ba bdag la byin
T02D1793-2:142b-21: gyis brlab pa'i rim pas ye shes kyi sku'o //
T02D1793-2:142b-22: don dam pa zhes pa ni rim pa bzhi pas 'od gsal ba'o //
T02D1793-2:142b-23: de gnyis yang dag par 'dus pa zhes pa ni
T02D1793-2:142b-24: rim pa gsum pa dang bzhi pa bsdus pa las
T02D1793-2:142b-25: byung ba'o // bde ba chen po'i sku ste zhes
T02D1793-2:142b-26: pa ni zung du 'jug pa'i rim pas rdo rje
T02D1793-2:142b-28: 'dod chags rnam par spyod pa'i phyir //
T02D1793-2:142b-29: zhes pa ni kun du chags pa'i 'dod chags rnam par sbyangs bas so //
T02D1793-2:142b-30: 'dod chags la spyod pa'i ngo bo nyid ces pa
T02D1793-2:142b-31: ni de kho na nyid la chags pa'i spyod pa'i
T02D1793-2:142b-33: 'od dpag tu med pa ni chos bstan pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1793-2:142b-34: gsung gi ngo bo yin pas 'gro ba 'dul bar mdzad pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1793-2:142b-35: de'i sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i spyan ni
T02D1793-2:142b-36: zhes pa ni sku la sogs pa mnyes par mdzad
T02D1793-2:142b-37: pa'o // ngag gi dbang phyug mnyes pas zhes pa
T02D1793-2:142b-38: ni yan lag drug cu'i sku gsung dang ldan pas
T02D1793-2:142b-39: pa'o // so // de nyid kyi phyir mchog tu
T02D1793-2:142b-40: thugs rje che ba'i bdag nyid do zhes pa ni
T02D1793-2:142b-41: thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa ste /
T02D1793-2:142b-42: dmyal ba la sogs pa las gdon pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1793-2:142b-44: tshangs pa'i gnas bzhis zhes pa ni byams pa la sogs pas so //
T02D1793-2:143a-0: @143a * // dgongs pa'i don mdzad pa zhes pa ni sangs rgyas nyid thob pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1793-2:143a-1: dus thams cad ces bya ba ni ma chad pas so //
T02D1793-2:143a-2: shin tu dga' bas zhes pa ni spyod pa dang bcas pas spyod pas so //
T02D1793-2:143a-4: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs ni las thams cad pa yin pas so //
T02D1793-2:143a-5: 'phags ma sgrol ma ni dam tshig sgrol ma'o //
T02D1793-2:143a-6: rang bzhin brgya drug cu'i spyod pa zhes pa ni nyin mo dang mtshan mos so //
T02D1793-2:143a-7: 'gags shing zhes pa ni shes rab dang thabs dang
T02D1793-2:143a-8: nye bar thob pa'i ngo bo sngags dang phyag rgya'i
T02D1793-2:143a-11: sgyu ma dag ni thams cad las //
T02D1793-2:143a-12: bud med sgyu ma khyad par 'phags //
T02D1793-2:143a-13: snang ba gsum gyi dbye ba ni //
T02D1793-2:143a-16: ye shes kyi nyid kyis zhes pa ni snang ba
T02D1793-2:143a-17: dang snang ba mched pa dang snang ba nye bar
T02D1793-2:143a-18: thob pa'o // nyid ni de rnams nub pa ste sngar bshad pa'i rim pas so //
T02D1793-2:143a-19: thams cad stong par zhugs pa zhes pa ni 'od gsal ba la zhugs pa'o //
T02D1793-2:143a-20: stong pa shin tu stong pa dang //
T02D1793-2:143a-21: gsum pa stong pa chen pa ste //
T02D1793-2:143a-22: rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dbye bas so //
T02D1793-2:143a-23: zhes 'byung bas lta ba ste zhes pa ni sems
T02D1793-2:143a-24: can rnam par dag pa'i rim pas 'od gsal ba'i
T02D1793-2:143a-25: ting nge 'dzin la zhugs par gzigs nas so //
T02D1793-2:143a-26: skul bar byed pa ni sad par byed pa ste /
T02D1793-2:143a-27: sems can gyi don byed pa'i phyir skul bar byed pa'o //
T02D1793-2:143a-28: gzhan du ni chad pa'i phyogs su thal bar 'gyur ba dang /
T02D1793-2:143a-29: dbang phyug chen po'i lta ba las ldog par mi 'gyur ro //
T02D1793-2:143a-30: rtag pa dang ni chad pa'i phyogs //
T02D1793-2:143a-31: gang zhig spangs nas rab 'jug pa //
T02D1793-2:143a-32: zhes zung du 'jug pa'i rim pa las 'byung ba'i phyir ro //
T02D1793-2:143a-33: don yod grub pa'i sgo nas bos pa zhes pa
T02D1793-2:143a-34: ni dam tshig sgrol ma ni las kyi rigs yin
T02D1793-2:143a-35: pa dang / 'khor ba dang bdag po'i 'brel pa
T02D1793-2:143a-36: dang mtshungs pas bcom ldan 'das bod pa ni rigs
T02D1793-2:143a-37: pa dang / so // rdo rje dang padma mnyam
T02D1793-2:143a-38: par sbyor ba zhes bya ba ni phyag rgya legs
T02D1793-2:143a-39: par sbyangs pa sngon du 'gro bar rdo rje dang
T02D1793-2:143a-41: phyung ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams kyis zhes pa
T02D1793-2:143a-42: ni badzra dhrik ces bya ba la sogs pas phyung
T02D1793-2:143b-0: ba'i sngags kyi reg bya rdo rje ma'i chos @143b
T02D1793-2:143b-1: 'byung gi nang na dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor spro
T02D1793-2:143b-2: ba las 'byung ba mi bskyod pa la sogs pa
T02D1793-2:143b-3: de bzhin gshegs pa dang byang chub sems dpa' dang
T02D1793-2:143b-4: lha mo dang khro mo rnams kyis so //
T02D1793-2:143b-5: zhe sdang la sogs pa'i sems can gyi khams rnam
T02D1793-2:143b-6: par sbyong bas na zhes pa ni padma'i nang du
T02D1793-2:143b-7: phyir mi ldog pa'i dbang bskur byin nas rgyas btab
T02D1793-2:143b-8: cing phyi rol du spros te /
T02D1793-2:143b-9: zhe sdang la sogs pa lngas khyab pa'i sems can
T02D1793-2:143b-10: gyi khams bstan pa la sogs pa'i rnam par sbyang
T02D1793-2:143b-11: zhing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing la rab tu 'jug pas so //
T02D1793-2:143b-12: de ni dkyil 'khor rgyal ba mchog / ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to //
T02D1793-2:143b-13: 'dir gal te de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
T02D1793-2:143b-14: sgo nas sems can gyi don bstan pa de bzhin
T02D1793-2:143b-15: du yang bya ba nan tan grub pa'i gtso bo
T02D1793-2:143b-16: yin pas don yod grub pa la dbang ba yin
T02D1793-2:143b-17: te las kyi rigs yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1793-2:143b-18: bstan pa la sogs pa'i bya ba ni las te /
T02D1793-2:143b-19: gtso bor gyur pa'i rigs ni las kyi rigs te /
T02D1793-2:143b-20: rlung gi khams kyi ngo bo yin pas so //
T02D1793-2:143b-21: de nyid kyi phyir dam tshig gi mchog go //
T02D1793-2:143b-22: sems can gyi don bya ba dang dam tshig yin
T02D1793-2:143b-23: gyi gzhan ni dam tshig tsam mo ste de'i yan
T02D1793-2:143b-26: zhe sdang gti mug 'dod chags dang //
T02D1793-2:143b-27: yid bzhin nor bu dam tshig ste //
T02D1793-2:143b-28: rigs ni de dag lnga po ni //
T02D1793-2:143b-29: 'dod dang thar pa rab sgrub pa'o //
T02D1793-2:143b-31: 'dod chags la spyod pa'i sems can rnams kyi zhes
T02D1793-2:143b-32: bya ba ni de'i rigs kyi rang bzhin gyi gang
T02D1793-2:143b-33: zag rnams kyi'o // 'dod chags rnam par dag pa'i
T02D1793-2:143b-34: thabs kyis zhes pa ni 'dod chags kyi sgras snang
T02D1793-2:143b-35: ba mched pa'i ye shes kyi 'brel pa can gyi
T02D1793-2:143b-36: rang bzhin bzhi bcu bstan to //
T02D1793-2:143b-37: de rnams kyi rnam par dag pa ni sngags dang phyag rgya'i rim pas spong ba'o //
T02D1793-2:143b-38: de nyid thabs ni gnyen po'i phyogs so //
T02D1793-2:143b-39: des ni gnyen po'i phyogs kyi thabs kyis so //
T02D1793-2:143b-40: byang chub rab tu rtsol bas na //
T02D1793-2:143b-41: zhes pa ni snang ba mched pa'i rang bzhin spong
T02D1793-2:143b-42: bas 'od gsal ba'i de kho na nyid mngon du
T02D1793-2:143b-43: byed pas so // de nyid kyi phyir phan yon che'o //
T02D1793-2:143b-44: phan pa yang yin la chen po yang yin pas na phan chen ni thar pa'i go 'phang ngo //
T02D1793-2:144a-1: nyid don ni dgos pa gang la yod pa zhes
T02D1793-2:144a-2: bya ba la 'dzin pa sngon du 'gro ba'i 'bru
T02D1793-2:144a-4: sh'akya'i rigs las byung ba rnams kyi zhes pa ni nges par gzung ba'i drug pa'o //
T02D1793-2:144a-5: sh'akya'i rigs las byung ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa
T02D1793-2:144a-6: dang byang chub sems dpa' dang lha mo rnams dang
T02D1793-2:144a-7: khro bo ste dkyil 'khor rnams so //
T02D1793-2:144a-8: de rnams kyi nang du mchog tu gyur pa ni rgyan dang 'dra bar gyur pas so //
T02D1793-2:144a-9: rgyan dang 'dra ba ni mi bskyod pa la sogs
T02D1793-2:144a-10: pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i nang na rta mchog ni
T02D1793-2:144a-11: 'gro ba'i don bya ba la nus pa dang ldan
T02D1793-2:144a-12: pas so // de nyid bstan pa'i phyir yang na zhes bya ba ni go sla'o //
T02D1793-2:144a-13: rang dang gzhan gyi rnam par dbye ba zhes bya
T02D1793-2:144a-14: ba la sogs pa ni sems can rnams kyi rang
T02D1793-2:144a-15: bzhin gyi rnam par rtog pa ji srid yod pa
T02D1793-2:144a-18: nga rgyal las ni rab skyes pa //
T02D1793-2:144a-19: bdag gi byed par nye bar 'phel //
T02D1793-2:144a-20: skye bo phan par nges smra bas //
T02D1793-2:144a-21: skye dgu ma lus 'di ltar gsungs //
T02D1793-2:144a-23: de bzhin du bdag nyid yod pas gzhan gyi 'du shes te /
T02D1793-2:144a-24: rang bzhin dbye bas rjes su chags dang ldan //
T02D1793-2:144a-25: de dag gi ni yang dag 'brel ba yi //
T02D1793-2:144a-26: skyon ni thams cad rab tu skye bar 'gyur //
T02D1793-2:144a-28: de la dmigs pa ni ma rig pa dang /
T02D1793-2:144a-29: nyams su myong ba'i bag chags dag gis nye bar dmigs pa'o //
T02D1793-2:144a-30: de bral ba ni bdag med pa'i lta bas spong pa'o //
T02D1793-2:144a-31: bdag dang bcas pa'i dngos po rnams la bdag med pa'i lta ba kho na gnyen po yin no //
T02D1793-2:144a-32: de ltar yod na yang sems can rnams la thugs
T02D1793-2:144a-33: rjes su brtse bas zhes pa ni khams gsum pa'i
T02D1793-2:144a-34: sems can gyi tshogs thugs rjes 'gro bar mdzad pas
T02D1793-2:144a-35: so // gang gi phyir sangs rgyas rnams kyi skyes bu'i spyod pa 'di yin te /
T02D1793-2:144a-36: gang gis chos thams cad stong par mkhyen nas kyang 'gro ba'i don mdzad pa'o //
T02D1793-2:144a-37: 'di ni ngo mtshar ngo mtshar te //
T02D1793-2:144a-38: rmad du byung las rmad du byung //
T02D1793-2:144a-39: chos 'di stong par mkhyen nas kyang //
T02D1793-2:144a-40: gang zhig las dang 'bras bu bstan //
T02D1793-2:144a-42: de lta bu'i khyad par can gyi yon tan zhes
T02D1793-2:144a-43: pa ni sngar bshad pa'i yon tan gyi tshogs kyis
T02D1793-2:144b-1: yon tan gyi rin chen zhes bya ba la sogs
T02D1793-2:144b-2: pa'i 'grel pa ni gang gi phyir zhes bya ba
T02D1793-2:144b-4: gang gi phyir ni rgyu gang las so //
T02D1793-2:144b-5: 'dod chags zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni 'dod
T02D1793-2:144b-6: chags te rang bzhin bzhi bcu mi mthun pa dang
T02D1793-2:144b-7: / nyi ma'i snang ba dang 'dra ba snang ba mched pa'i ye shes ni gnyen po'o //
T02D1793-2:144b-8: 'dod chags dang bral ba ni rang bzhin sum cu
T02D1793-2:144b-9: rtsa gsum mi mthun pa dang zla ba'i snang ba
T02D1793-2:144b-10: dang 'dra ba snang ba'i ye shes ni gnyen po'o
T02D1793-2:144b-11: // 'dod chags par ma ni rang bzhin bdun mi mthun pa dang /
T02D1793-2:144b-12: mtshams kyi snang ba dang 'dra ba snang ba nye bar thob pa'i ye shes ni gnyen po'o //
T02D1793-2:144b-13: 'od gsal ba zhes pa ni ye shes gsum dang
T02D1793-2:144b-14: bral bas nyi ma dang zla ba dang mtshams kyi
T02D1793-2:144b-15: snang ba dang 'dra ba sprin med pa'i nam mkha'
T02D1793-2:144b-16: dang 'dra ba ste de kho na nyid bzhi pa'o
T02D1793-2:144b-17: // de nyid ye shes kyi gnyen por gyur pas na ye shes so //
T02D1793-2:144b-18: de rnams kyi bzlas dbye bar byas nas 'di skyed pa zhes pa ni gsal bar byed pa'o //
T02D1793-2:144b-19: ye shes gsum gyi rab dbye ba //
T02D1793-2:144b-20: de nyid kyis ni gsal bar mtshon //
T02D1793-2:144b-22: bdag gi ston par byed pa zhes pa ni phyag rgya las gzhan gyi mtshon pa'i thabs med do //
T02D1793-2:144b-24: rang dang gzhan gyi don grub phyir //
T02D1793-2:144b-25: 'khor ba ru ni thabs gzhan med //
T02D1793-2:144b-26: chos rnams thams cad gnyis med pa //
T02D1793-2:144b-27: gnyis kyi ngo bo bstan pa ste //
T02D1793-2:144b-28: de phyir rtag tu khyod kyis ni //
T02D1793-2:144b-31: 'dod chags ni snang ba mched pa'o //
T02D1793-2:144b-32: zhe sdang ni snang ba'i ye shes so //
T02D1793-2:144b-33: gti mug ni ma rig pa ste de nyid snang ba nye bar thob pa'o //
T02D1793-2:144b-34: de rnams kyi rnam par dag pa ni sngar bshad pa'i rim pas bkag pa'o //
T02D1793-2:144b-35: de nyid ni thabs te nges so //
T02D1793-2:144b-36: rdo rje sems dpa'i tshe dang srog stsol bas zhes
T02D1793-2:144b-37: pa ni rdo rje sems dpa' ste 'od gsal ba'o
T02D1793-2:144b-38: // de nyid kyis dngos po thams cad khyab pas tshe dang 'dra bas na tshe'o //
T02D1793-2:144b-39: spro ba dang bcas pas de nyid srog gi dbang po dang 'dra ba'o //
T02D1793-2:144b-40: stsol bas ni de sbyin pas so //
T02D1793-2:144b-41: gson par mdzod cig ces pa ni rjes su gzung bar mdzod cig go //
T02D1793-2:145a-0: tshig gi don ni 'di yin te 'od gsal ba'i @145a * //
T02D1793-2:145a-2: snyoms par zhugs pa'i sgo nas bdag kyang 'od gsal ba la snyoms par zhugs shig go //
T02D1793-2:145a-3: de nyid kyi phyir dgongs so zhes smos so //
T02D1793-2:145a-4: de ltar zhes bya ba la sogs pas lha mo
T02D1793-2:145a-5: bzhis bskul ba gsal nas 'gro ba'i don mdzad pa'i
T02D1793-2:145a-6: phyir bcom ldan 'das kyis 'od gsal ba'i ting nge
T02D1793-2:145a-8: tshangs pa'i gnas zhes pa ni byams pa la sogs pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis so //
T02D1793-2:145a-9: yang dag par bskul ba zhes pa ni bskul bar bya'o //
T02D1793-2:145a-10: gang gi phyir thog ma ma yin pa'i dus nas
T02D1793-2:145a-11: tshad med pa la goms pas bcom ldan 'das sangs
T02D1793-2:145a-12: rgyas rnams kyis lhun gyis 'gro ba'i don mdzad de
T02D1793-2:145a-13: / dgon pa'i zhib las grong mthar //
T02D1793-2:145a-14: mtsho las rig pa'i klu bzhin no //
T02D1793-2:145a-15: 'dul ba'i don du thugs rje yis //
T02D1793-2:145a-16: rig pas bzhin du dgug par byas //
T02D1793-2:145a-17: dam pa zhi ba la zhugs kyang //
T02D1793-2:145a-18: thugs rjes gzhan dbang nyid kyis ni //
T02D1793-2:145a-19: bzo ba'i rigs la sogs rnams su //
T02D1793-2:145a-20: khyod ni brtan pas gnas par byas //
T02D1793-2:145a-22: de nyid kyi phyir bstan pa sngon gyi smon lam zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni //
T02D1793-2:145a-23: 'gro la phan phyir sangs rgyas 'grub par shog //
T02D1793-2:145a-24: ces bya ba dang po sangs rgyas rnams kyi dam bcas pa de nyid smon lam mo //
T02D1793-2:145a-25: de'i rgyun ni thugs kyi rgyud la rtag tu gnas pa'o //
T02D1793-2:145a-26: de'i shugs ni nus pa ste /
T02D1793-2:145a-27: lhun gyis de'i ngo bo nyid du bskal pa mtha'
T02D1793-2:145a-28: yas pas byang chub thob pas sangs rgyas bcom ldan
T02D1793-2:145a-29: 'das rnams snga ma'i smon lam gyi bag chags mi
T02D1793-2:145a-30: gtong ste rus sbal dmar po bzhin no //
T02D1793-2:145a-31: nyes pa ma lus skyed byed 'jig tshogs lta bu'i bud shing gang sreg pa //
T02D1793-2:145a-32: rang gzhan dbye ba'i yang rnams nges bton de rnams kyi ni skyon mi 'byung //
T02D1793-2:145a-33: gnyid med pa yang rig bzhin snying rjes sgyu ma'i skyes bu las rnams su //
T02D1793-2:145a-34: blo bzang s'a ma'i smon lam gyis ni bskul te 'khor ba'i shugs bzhin no //
T02D1793-2:145a-36: stong pa nyid kyi rnal 'byor las bzhengs nas zhes
T02D1793-2:145a-37: pa ni 'od gsal ba'i ting nge 'dzin las cig
T02D1793-2:145a-38: car ram snang ba nye bar thob pa la sogs
T02D1793-2:145b-0: pa'i @145b rim gyis bdag la byin gyis brlab pa'i
T02D1793-2:145b-1: mtshan nyid kyi ye shes kyi sku'am /
T02D1793-2:145b-2: rim pa bzhi pa las gsung pa'i de kho na
T02D1793-2:145b-3: nyid las cig car du zung du 'jug pa'i bdag
T02D1793-2:145b-4: nyid can gyi rdo rje'i sku bzhengs nas so //
T02D1793-2:145b-5: dpal shin tu dga' ba zhes bya ba la sogs
T02D1793-2:145b-6: pa ni dpal gyi sgras mtshon nas bsod nams dang
T02D1793-2:145b-7: ye shes kyis tshogs gzung ngo //
T02D1793-2:145b-8: shin tu dga' ba'i bde ba ni //
T02D1793-2:145b-9: dbang po gnyis kyi bde ba'o //
T02D1793-2:145b-10: de las byung ba'i 'dod chags la spyod pa ni bsrung bya srung byed kyi rol pa'o //
T02D1793-2:145b-11: de bstan pa'i phyir 'dod chags la spyod pa'i sems
T02D1793-2:145b-12: can gyi khams thabs de nyid kyis de sbyangs pa'i
T02D1793-2:145b-13: phyir ro // 'jig rten pa ni chags pas bcings //
T02D1793-2:145b-14: chags pa nyid kyis grol 'gyur te //
T02D1793-2:145b-15: phyin ci log pa'i rtog pa de //
T02D1793-2:145b-16: sangs rgyas mu stegs pas mi shes //
T02D1793-2:145b-18: dkon mchog brtsegs pa'i mdo las kyang /
T02D1793-2:145b-19: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
T02D1793-2:145b-20: 'ong srungs bu ram gyi shing dang 'bras s'a lu'i
T02D1793-2:145b-21: zhing la lud kyi phung po phan par 'gyur ba
T02D1793-2:145b-22: de bzhin du / byang chub sems dpa'i nyon mongs pa rnams phan par 'gyur ro //
T02D1793-2:145b-23: dper na 'ong srungs tsam ba ka'i me tog spos
T02D1793-2:145b-24: kyi glang pos zos na gal rtsi'i ngo bo 'gyur
T02D1793-2:145b-25: ro // de nyid tha mal pa'i srog chags kyis
T02D1793-2:145b-26: zos pa mi gtsang ba'i ngo bor 'gyur ba de
T02D1793-2:145b-27: bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i nyon mongs pa rnams
T02D1793-2:145b-29: rnal ma spyad par bya ste de nyid shin tu
T02D1793-2:145b-30: dga' ba'i 'dod chags kyi spyod pa bstan pa'i phyir
T02D1793-2:145b-31: ro // 'khyud pa ni shing la 'dzeg pa la sogs pa'i dbye ba rnam pa brgyad do //
T02D1793-2:145b-32: 'o byed pa ni stod smad kyi mchu'i dbye ba rnam pa brgyad do //
T02D1793-2:145b-33: lkog ma mkhur tshos dang ni nu ma kha nang dang //
T02D1793-2:145b-34: ma mchu dang ni mig dang dpral ba dang //
T02D1793-2:145b-35: chan khung gnyis dang bral yi mtshams dang ni //
T02D1793-2:145b-36: lte ba'i rtsa bar yang ni 'o byed 'gyur //
T02D1793-2:145b-38: 'jib pa ni rnam pa gnyis te /
T02D1793-2:145b-41: thal mo brdab pa zhes pa ni byed pa'i sbyor ba'i dbang gis rdul la sogs pa 'byung ba'o //
T02D1793-2:145b-42: de rnams kyang snying stobs kyi dngos po brgyad do //
T02D1793-2:146a-1: ba rdul dang ba spu ldang //
T02D1793-2:146a-3: kha dog log dang mchi ma dang //
T02D1793-2:146a-4: thim pa zhes bya snying stobs brgyad //
T02D1793-2:146a-5: thal mo brdab pa ni lag pa g-yon pa dang g-yas pas autpala'i 'dab ma sbyin pa'o //
T02D1793-2:146a-6: de'i dbye ba ni gsum ste bde ba'i sgra dang
T02D1793-2:146a-7: rdo rje padma'i sgra dang autpala gyi 'dab ma'i sgra'o
T02D1793-2:146a-8: // so gdab pa ni brgyad de ri mo la sogs pa'i dbye bas so //
T02D1793-2:146a-9: sen mo gdab pa ni brgyad de nor bu'i phreng ba la sogs pa'i dbye bas so //
T02D1793-2:146a-10: 'jam pa snum zhing mnyam por mi phyed pa //
T02D1793-2:146a-11: 'phel ba'i ri mo med pa'i dbyibs dang ldan //
T02D1793-2:146a-12: sen mo de mtshan lkog dang mchan khung brang //
T02D1793-2:146a-13: nyed pa rgyab dang brla dang nu mar ro //
T02D1793-2:146a-18: dpyang thag ni bya ba'i khyad par te gang du
T02D1793-2:146a-19: skyes pa ni 'og tu dang shes rab ni steng
T02D1793-2:146a-21: brkyang pa ni rkang pa dang rje dar dang pus mo dang brla brkyang pas sbyor ba'o //
T02D1793-2:146a-22: grong gi bya ba ni rgyab tu sbyor ba ste byol song gi dga' ba bzhin no //
T02D1793-2:146a-24: kha sbyar dang ni phyag 'tshal dang //
T02D1793-2:146a-26: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gzung ngo //
T02D1793-2:146a-27: de la sogs pa'i bya ba ni skyed pa'i bya ba rnams so //
T02D1793-2:146a-28: de gtso bor gyur ba'i rmongs pa ni shin tu dga' ba gang yin pa des so //
T02D1793-2:146a-29: 'jug pa byed pa shes bya dngos po dbyer med pa'i //
T02D1793-2:146a-30: khyad par sbyor ba de nyid dga' ba sna tshogs ba //
T02D1793-2:146a-31: 'khor ba'i lam ni rgyas dang bskum pa'i phyir //
T02D1793-2:146a-32: de yi spros pa dang ni yang dag bshad par bya ;
T02D1793-2:146a-33: ; zhes bya ba rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i dga'
T02D1793-2:146a-34: ba'i sbyor ba'i tshigs su bcad pa 'dod pa'i bstan
T02D1793-2:146a-36: mu tig gi phreng ba g-yo ba ni zhes bya
T02D1793-2:146a-37: ba la sogs pas snyoms par zhugs pa'i dbang gis
T02D1793-2:146a-38: rgyan rnams g-yo ba bstan to //
T02D1793-2:146a-39: yul dang dbang po zhes pa ni de la yul
T02D1793-2:146a-40: ni yul lnga'i bdag nyid kyi lha mo ste reg
T02D1793-2:146a-42: dbang po ni thabs kyi rang bzhin bcom ldan 'das rdo rje can spyod pa'o //
T02D1793-2:146a-43: de'i rdo rje dang padma ni mtsho skyes dang gsang
T02D1793-2:146a-44: ba ste de dag mnyam par sbyor ba ni phrad
T02D1793-2:146a-45: pa'o // rgyu des thabs snyoms par zhugs pa ni lte ba gnyis sbyor ba'o //
T02D1793-2:146b-0: @146b des a'a li dang k'a li ni dbyangs dang gsal bya'i rang bzhin te khrag dang khu ba'o //
T02D1793-2:146b-1: de dang ldan pa'i srid pa'i gdugs ni rtsa dbu ma ste /
T02D1793-2:146b-2: bcom ldan 'das mi bskyod pa'i rang bzhin te chu rgyu ba'o //
T02D1793-2:146b-3: rus sbal ni rtsa g-yas pa ste rdo rje nyi ma'i ngo bo khrag rgyu ba'o //
T02D1793-2:146b-4: de bzhin du zla ba gang ba ni rtsa g-yon pa ste /
T02D1793-2:146b-5: 'od dpag tu med pa'i rang bzhin shu kra rgyu ba'o //
T02D1793-2:146b-6: de nye bar mtshon pa tsam yin te rtsa gnyis
T02D1793-2:146b-7: po ni gzhan ni shar dang nub phyogs su gnas
T02D1793-2:146b-8: pa lha sbyin dang nor rgyal ma ste /
T02D1793-2:146b-9: bshad pa dang sha rgyu ba rnam par snang mdzad dang don yod grub pa'i rang bzhin no //
T02D1793-2:146b-10: de'i nang na gtso bo yin pas rtsa gsum ni
T02D1793-2:146b-11: sku gsung thugs kyi rang bzhin sor mo gsum ni
T02D1793-2:146b-12: mig la sogs pa'i rang bzhin phyag rgya bzhis bskul
T02D1793-2:146b-13: bar bya ste / bde ba chen po bskyed pa'i
T02D1793-2:146b-14: phyir dang byang chub kyi sems 'dzag pa'i phyir ro
T02D1793-2:146b-15: bar bya ste / // de nyid bskul ba ste des so //
T02D1793-2:146b-16: de bzhin du dga' ba'i sgyu ma'i sgra ni rnam
T02D1793-2:146b-17: pa brgyad kyi bde ba chen po'i sgra des so
T02D1793-2:146b-18: // mchog tu dga' ba'i bde ba'i de kho na nyid bzhi pa'o //
T02D1793-2:146b-19: nyams su myong ba ni reg nas so //
T02D1793-2:146b-20: de'i 'og tu phung po la sogs pa'i rang bzhin
T02D1793-2:146b-21: de bzhin gshegs pa gang yin pa de rnams spyi
T02D1793-2:146b-22: bo nas brtsams te zhes pa ni tshangs pa'i bu
T02D1793-2:146b-24: dri ma med pa'i char rgyun bzhin du zhes pa
T02D1793-2:146b-25: ni 'o ma'i rgya mtsho'i dba' rlabs dang 'dra ba'o
T02D1793-2:146b-26: // bzhus la ni dbus ma'i lam nas rdo rje rtse mor phyin pa dang /
T02D1793-2:146b-27: de la yang bde ba chen po myong nas so //
T02D1793-2:146b-28: de nas byang chub kyi sems kyi ngo bo nyid
T02D1793-2:146b-29: ni shu kra'i gzugs su 'dzag pa ni spro ba'o
T02D1793-2:146b-30: // chos 'byung gi nang du yang dag par bzhag
T02D1793-2:146b-31: ste zhes pa ni reg bya rdo rje ma'i padma'i
T02D1793-2:146b-32: nang gi lte bar shu kra'i thig le spros so
T02D1793-2:146b-33: // // 'o na bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas gyen
T02D1793-2:146b-34: du ri ta tshangs par spyod pa yin na ji
T02D1793-2:146b-35: ltar shukra gtong bar mdzad ce na /
T02D1793-2:146b-36: smras pa dgos pa'i dbang gis sangs rgyas rnams kyi byang chub kyi sems spro ba yin gyi /
T02D1793-2:146b-37: gzhan dbang gis ni ma yin te so so skye bo bzhin no //
T02D1793-2:146b-38: dgos pa de yang dkyil 'khor pa'i lha'i 'khor lo spro bas /
T02D1793-2:146b-39: 'gro ba'i don mdzad pa zhes skyon med do //
T02D1793-2:147a-2: zhe sdang la sogs pa la spyod pa'i sems can rnams rnam par sbyangs nas zhes smos te /
T02D1793-2:147a-3: nyon mongs pa lngas khyab pa'i 'gro ba sbyang bar bya ba'i phyir ro //
T02D1793-2:147a-4: dkyil 'khor 'khor lo phyung ste zhes pa ni padma'i nang dang phyi rol du'o zhes tshig lhag ma'o//
T02D1793-2:147a-5: yang 'od gsal ba la zhugs nas zhes pa ni dkyil 'khor rgyal ba mchog dang /
T02D1793-2:147a-6: las kyi rgyal ba mchog rdzogs nas bya ba byas pas 'od gsal ba la 'jug pa'o //
T02D1793-2:147a-7: de nyid kyi khyad par ni rnam par rtog pa
T02D1793-2:147a-8: med par 'gyur ba zhes pa ni yang dag pa'i
T02D1793-2:147a-10: ji ltar me long la ni dbugs //
T02D1793-2:147a-11: de nyid du ni thim 'gyur ba //
T02D1793-2:147a-12: yang dag mtha' la rnal 'byor pa //
T02D1793-2:147a-13: de bzhin gzhan dang gzhan du 'jug / ces 'byung ngo //
T02D1793-2:147a-15: gzugs la sogs pa'i yul rnams zhes pa ni phyag rgya la gnas pa'o //
T02D1793-2:147a-16: rang gi ngo bo nyid yongs su shes pas zhes
T02D1793-2:147a-17: pa ni 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga de bzhin gshegs
T02D1793-2:147a-18: pa lngar yongs su shes pas so //
T02D1793-2:147a-19: mdor bsdus pas ni 'dod pa lnga //
T02D1793-2:147a-20: sangs rgyas lngar ni rab tu grags //
T02D1793-2:147a-22: mig la sogs pa gcig tu byas pa zhes pa ni yul dang dbang po sbyor ba'o //
T02D1793-2:147a-23: des ni so sor sdud pa dang bsam gtan gnyis bstan to //
T02D1793-2:147a-24: de'i tshe kun dga' ba'i bde ba'i gnas skabs ni
T02D1793-2:147a-25: yul dang dbang po dang yang dag par sbyor ba
T02D1793-2:147a-27: de las byung ba'i kun dga' ni dbye ba lnga'i rtog pa la sogs pa'o //
T02D1793-2:147a-28: de nyid bde ba ni sems rtse gcig pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid do //
T02D1793-2:147a-29: de'i gnas skabs ni snyoms par zhugs pa ste /
T02D1793-2:147a-30: de zhes bya ba ni ting nge 'dzin to //
T02D1793-2:147a-31: spyan ma la sogs pa ni zhes pa ni spyan
T02D1793-2:147a-32: la sogs pa dang dbyer med pa'i reg bya rdo
T02D1793-2:147a-33: rje ma ste / nu ma ma byung bha ga'i mkhar //
T02D1793-2:147a-34: spyan la sogs pa rnam par gnas //
T02D1793-2:147a-36: rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i rang bzhin zhes
T02D1793-2:147a-37: pa ni rang gi sku'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa
T02D1793-2:147a-38: gzugs la sogs pa'i rang bzhin rtag pa la sogs
T02D1793-2:147b-0: bstan pa la sogs pa'i bya ba dang @147b bral
T02D1793-2:147b-1: zhing shes pa ni nang du zhal bltas pas lus
T02D1793-2:147b-2: dang ngag gi bya ba dang bral pa'o //
T02D1793-2:147b-3: ye shes kyi phyag rgya dang zhes pa ni spyan
T02D1793-2:147b-4: la sogs pa'i lha mo dang dbyer med pa reg
T02D1793-2:147b-5: bya rdo rje ma dang lhan cig snyoms par zhugs
T02D1793-2:147b-6: pa'i bde ba myong bar gyur to //
T02D1793-2:147b-7: bcom ldan 'das snyoms par zhugs na cho 'phrul bstan pa'i phyir /
T02D1793-2:147b-9: rdo rje 'chang gi ngo bo nyid //
T02D1793-2:147b-10: zhes pa ni rdo rje 'chang chen po'i ngo bo nyid do //
T02D1793-2:147b-11: rdo rje gsum dang yang dag par ldan pa zhes
T02D1793-2:147b-12: pa ni sku rdo rje la sogs pa'i ngo bo
T02D1793-2:147b-13: rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa de bzhin gshegs
T02D1793-2:147b-14: pa rnams gang yin pa de rnams kyi tshogs ni
T02D1793-2:147b-15: sdes yongs su gang zhing khengs pa'o //
T02D1793-2:147b-16: de bzhin du til gyi gong bu bzhin du zhes
T02D1793-2:147b-17: bya ba ni dpes phan tshun ma 'dres par gnas
T02D1793-2:147b-18: pa'o // rdo rje chus gang ba ltar zhes pa
T02D1793-2:147b-19: ni dpe gnyis pa ste de'i bshad pa ni mchog
T02D1793-2:147b-20: tu dga' ba'i bum pa bzhin no //
T02D1793-2:147b-21: mi g-yo bar gyur to zhes pa ni ting nge
T02D1793-2:147b-22: 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i
T02D1793-2:147b-23: tshogs kyis nam mkha'i khams yongs su gang bar 'gyur
T02D1793-2:147b-24: ro // rang gi don bshad nas gzhan gyi don
T02D1793-2:147b-25: bstan pa'i phyir de ltar zhes bya ba la sogs
T02D1793-2:147b-26: ro // pa smos te / khams gsum na gnas pa zhes pa ni khams gsum gyi yul du'o //
T02D1793-2:147b-27: rdo rje gsum gyi rang bzhin ni //
T02D1793-2:147b-28: sku gsung thugs kyi bdag nyid can no //
T02D1793-2:147b-29: rdo rje 'chang chen po'i bde bas zhes pa ni
T02D1793-2:147b-30: bcom ldan 'das las 'byung ba'i 'od zer gyi tshogs
T02D1793-2:147b-31: kyis so // yul du byas pas zhes pa ni 'od zer gyi dbang gis dbang bsku ra ba'o //
T02D1793-2:147b-32: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad nyid //
T02D1793-2:147b-33: ces pa ni rdo rje 'chang chen po nyid do //
T02D1793-2:147b-34: rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po ni sku la sogs
T02D1793-2:147b-35: pa'i rang bzhin gyis rnam par snang mdzad la sogs
T02D1793-2:147b-36: pa de bzhin gshegs pa gsum nye bar bsdu bar
T02D1793-2:147b-37: mdzad pas so // stobs bcu dang mi 'jigs pa bzhi la sogs pa zhes pa ni gnas dang /
T02D1793-2:147b-38: gnas ma yin pa'i ye shes kyi stobs la sogs pa dang /
T02D1793-2:147b-39: de bzhin du kun du zag pa zad pa'i ye shes la sogs pa mi 'jigs pa bzhi'o //
T02D1793-2:148a-1: zhes pa ni mngon du mdzad pa'o //
T02D1793-2:148a-2: rdo rje ni rdo rje 'chang chen po'i 'brel pa
T02D1793-2:148a-3: dang ldan pa 'od zer gyis dbang bskur ba zhes
T02D1793-2:148a-4: pa ni 'od kyis dbang bskur ba gang yin pa
T02D1793-2:148a-6: de dag kun du bzang po zhes bya ba ni
T02D1793-2:148a-7: kun du ste thog ma dang tha ma dang bar
T02D1793-2:148a-8: du bzang po ni bsod nams dang ye shes kyi
T02D1793-2:148a-9: tshogs gang las thos pa de ni kun du bzang
T02D1793-2:148a-10: po ste / bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang chen po dang 'dra bar gyur ro //
T02D1793-2:148a-11: de nyid kyi phyir sngon ma byung ba'i don gyi
T02D1793-2:148a-12: ming can du gyur to zhes pa ni sngar ma
T02D1793-2:148a-13: byung ba'i ming dang ldan par gyur to //
T02D1793-2:148a-14: de ltar zhes bya ba la sogs pas nye bar bsdus pa'o //
T02D1793-2:148a-15: sems can mnyam pa nyid ces pa ni khams gsum
T02D1793-2:148a-16: la gnas pa'i sems can rnams dang de bzhin gshegs
T02D1793-2:148a-18: gang gi phyir 'phags pa dang so so skye bo
T02D1793-2:148a-19: dag la don dam par 'ga' yang dbye ba med

T02D1793-2:148a-21: rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po'o zhes pa ni de rnams bskyed pa dang /
T02D1793-2:148a-24: rang gi snyoms par zhugs pa'i bde ba myong ba
T02D1793-2:148a-25: ni reg bya rdo rje ma dang snyoms par zhugs
T02D1793-2:148a-26: pa las byung ba'i dga' ba mngon du mdzad pas
T02D1793-2:148a-27: so // sems can thams cad ces pa ni khams
T02D1793-2:148a-28: gsum la gnas pa'i skye bo rnams snyoms par zhugs
T02D1793-2:148a-29: pa'i bdag gir mdzad pa'o zhes pa ni zhal gyis
T02D1793-2:148a-30: so // bzhes pa ste / de kho na nyid rtogs pa la thabs gzhan med pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1793-2:148a-31: rdo rje na nyid rtogs pa la thabs gzhan med pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1793-2:148a-32: rdo rje ye shes kyi spyod pa zhes pa ni rdo rje ni rdo rje 'chang ngo //
T02D1793-2:148a-33: de'i ye shes gsum nye bar mtshon pa'i don du spyod pa ni ye shes spyod pa ste /
T02D1793-2:148a-34: snyoms par zhugs pa'i spyod pa'o //
T02D1793-2:148a-35: nyams su myong bar mdzad nas zhes pa ni mngon du mdzad nas so //
T02D1793-2:148a-36: snyoms par zhugs pa las bzhengs nas zhes pa ni
T02D1793-2:148a-37: rdo rje 'chang chen po'i 'od zer gyis dbang bskur
T02D1793-2:148a-38: bas bka' drin thob pa snyoms par zhugs pa'i bde
T02D1793-2:148a-39: ba las so // thugs rab tu dgyes par gyur
T02D1793-2:148a-40: pas zhes pa ni chos nyid yongs su spyad pas
T02D1793-2:148b-0: 'dod chags kyi spyod @148b pa zhes pa ni snyoms par zhugs pa la sogs pa'i spyod pas so //
T02D1793-2:148b-1: rdo rje 'chang chen po nyid du zhes pa ni dpal rdo rje 'chang gi go 'phang ngo //
T02D1793-2:148b-2: thob pa ni thob par bya ba'o //
T02D1793-2:148b-3: ngo mtshar zhes pa ni 'gal ba'i spyod pa rab tu bstan pas so //
T02D1793-2:148b-4: de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa
T02D1793-2:148b-5: 'dod chags la sogs pa'i rnam par rtog pa bstan
T02D1793-2:148b-6: to // nam mkha'i rdo rje'i dam tshig ni de
T02D1793-2:148b-7: bzhin gshegs pa drug pa zhes pa ni nam mkha'
T02D1793-2:148b-8: dang 'od gsal ba zhes rnam grangs so //
T02D1793-2:148b-9: de nyid ni mi phyed pas na rdo rje'o //
T02D1793-2:148b-10: de nyid gshegs shing mngon du mdzad pas na dam
T02D1793-2:148b-11: tshig gang la yod pa de nam mkha'i rdo rje'i
T02D1793-2:148b-12: dam tshig ni rdo rje 'chang chen po'o //
T02D1793-2:148b-13: de bas na drug pa ste lnga'i rgyur gyur pa'o //
T02D1793-2:148b-14: chos thams cad de dang mnyam pa'i phyir zhes pa

T02D1793-2:148b-17: 'od gsal ba nyid ces pa ni stong pa nyid ces bya ba'o //
T02D1793-2:148b-18: gzugs ni lbu ba lta bur bshad //
T02D1793-2:148b-19: tshor ba chu bur dang mtshungs pa //
T02D1793-2:148b-22: sgyu ma lta bur rnam par shes //

T02D1793-2:148b-25: 'dir ni cung zad phyi nang med //
T02D1793-2:148b-26: phan tshun grub par byed ba'i phyir //
T02D1793-2:148b-27: bar na ma yin med pa min //
T02D1793-2:148b-28: sems tsam la ni mi gnas phyir //
T02D1793-2:148b-31: dbang po'i tshogs la 'dod chags med //

T02D1793-2:148b-34: med min yod pa ma yin no //
T02D1793-2:148b-35: sems kyi 'khrul pa mi shes pa'i //
T02D1793-2:148b-36: 'brel ba dang ldan rgyud las ni //

T02D1793-2:148b-42: 'od gsal ba bstan pas som nyi med par byas
T02D1793-2:148b-43: pa'o // spros nas zhes bya ba ni rgyas par bshad pa'o //
T02D1793-2:148b-44: chos thams cad 'od gsal ba nyid du gsungs pa'i
T02D1793-2:148b-45: zhes pa ni sngar bshad pa'i stong pa nyid bstan
T02D1793-2:149a-2: ; brjod du med pa yang yin la chos nyid

T02D1793-2:149a-7: chos nyid do // // rdo rje'i tshig gi don

T02D1793-2:149a-9: rdo rje'i tshig ste de'i don ni bshad pa'o //

T02D1793-2:149a-11: 'di la zhes pa'i bar du ni rgyud yongs su

T02D1793-2:149a-15: rdzogs pa'i rim pa zhes brjod par bya ba bstan

T02D1793-2:149a-17: po'o zhes pa ni de ston par byed pa'i gzhung
T02D1793-2:149a-18: gi tshogs ni rgyud kyi rgyal po ste /
T02D1793-2:149a-19: rje btsun dpal gsang ba 'dus pa yin no zhes brjod pa bstan pa yin no //

T02D1793-2:149a-25: sems can rnams thos pa dang bsam pa dang bsgom pa la skal pa dang ldan pa yin no //
T02D1793-2:149a-26: 'dod chags las byung ba'i byang chub kyi gnas zhes
T02D1793-2:149a-27: pa ni rdo rje 'chang nyid kyi go 'phang ngo
T02D1793-2:149a-28: // de thob pa ni nye bar dmigs pa'o //
T02D1793-2:149a-29: de snod du gyur pa'i phyir zhes pa ni de
T02D1793-2:149a-30: la skal ba dang ldan pa yin te 'dod pa'i
T02D1793-2:149a-31: khams kyi sems can rnams 'dod chags gtso bo yin
T02D1793-2:149a-32: pa'i phyir ro // de ltar zhes bya ba nas
T02D1793-2:149a-33: 'di'i don ni 'di yin te zhes pa'i bar du
T02D1793-2:149a-34: ni chos kyi mdzod dang 'dra ba'i dpal gsang ba

T02D1793-2:149a-38: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad las gcig nas gcig tu brgyud de /
T02D1793-2:149a-39: rdo rje 'chang gi zhal nas de bzhin gshegs pas thos pa dang /
T02D1793-2:149a-40: de rnams las lha mo dang byang chub sems dpa' dang /
T02D1793-2:149a-41: de rnams las lha rnams kyis dang /

T02D1793-2:149b-7: par snang mdzad la sogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa

T02D1793-2:149b-22: yi ge'i gzugs yin pas so //

T02D1793-2:149b-24: spobs pa dpag tu med pa'i zhes bya ba ni gzungs dang so sor ldan pas so //
T02D1793-2:149b-25: gzhung dang don dang nges pa'i tshig dang so sor
T02D1793-2:149b-26: snang ba ste so so yang dag par rig pa
T02D1793-2:149b-27: dang ldan pa lag na rdo rje yin no //
T02D1793-2:149b-28: gtso bo ni nus pa dang ldan pa'o //
T02D1793-2:149b-29: dbang bskur zhing rjes su gnang ba ste /
T02D1793-2:149b-30: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis so //
T02D1793-2:149b-31: gsung gi rdo rje gtso bo yin pa'o zhes pa
T02D1793-2:149b-32: ni lag na rdo rje sdud pa po la dbang
T02D1793-2:149b-34: de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung zhes bya ba la sogs pa sdud pa pos bzhed pa bstan to //
T02D1793-2:149b-35: rgyud bstan pa'i 'og tu zhes bya ba la sogs
T02D1793-2:149b-36: pas dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo nye bar bsdu ba'i
T02D1793-2:149b-37: sgo nas rdzogs pa nyid du bstan to //
T02D1793-2:150a-0: brjod du med pa'i zhes bya ba ni gzugs dang yon tan la sogs pa rtsis las @150a * //
T02D1793-2:150a-2: rigs lnga dang ldan pa'o zhes pa ni de bzhin
T02D1793-2:150a-3: gshegs pa dang lha mo dang byang chub sems dpa'

T02D1793-2:150a-8: mtha' yas pa'i zhes smos te /
T02D1793-2:150a-9: gzugs dang yon tan la sogs pa dang grangs kyis mtha' yas pa ste /
T02D1793-2:150a-10: ting nge 'dzin ni mtha' yas pa zhes le'u bcu gsum pa las gsungs so //
T02D1793-2:150a-11: sangs rgyas ni de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'o //
T02D1793-2:150a-12: byang chub sems dpa' ni sa'i snying po la sogs pa'o //
T02D1793-2:150a-13: yang na byang chub ni spyan ma la sogs pa dang gzugs rdo rje ma la sogs pa'o //
T02D1793-2:150a-14: sems dpa' ni sa'i snying po la sogs pa'o //
T02D1793-2:150a-15: khro bo ni gshin rje mthar byed la sogs pa'o //
T02D1793-2:150a-16: nye bar bsdu ba bstan pa'i phyir /
T02D1793-2:150a-17: rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa zhes smos te /
T02D1793-2:150a-18: de las sa'i snying po byams pa dang /
T02D1793-2:150a-22: 'dod pa'i rgyal po rnams rnam par snang mdzad la 'jug go //
T02D1793-2:150a-27: shes rab mthar byed ma dang /
T02D1793-2:150a-28: mi g-yo ba ni mi bskyod pa la 'jug go //
T02D1793-2:150a-34: dbyug sngon ni 'od dpag tu med pa la 'jug go //

T02D1793-2:150a-41: gi rigs yin no zhes thugs rdo rje la 'jug

T02D1793-2:150a-43: gtsug tor 'khor los sgyur ba ni rnam par snang mdzad la 'jug go //
T02D1793-2:150a-44: de rnams kyi nang na sprul pa gzhan ni rigs
T02D1793-2:150a-45: dang mthun pas rang rang gi rigs la rjes su

T02D1793-2:150b-4: zhes pa ni khams gsum gyi gnas la'o //
T02D1793-2:150b-5: sgo nga las skyes pa la sogs pa ni rnam pa bzhi'i sems can gyi khams so //
T02D1793-2:150b-6: mchog ni nam mkha' la spyod pa ste lha la sogs pa'o //
T02D1793-2:150b-7: 'bring ni sa la spyod pa ste mi la sogs pa'o //
T02D1793-2:150b-8: tha ma ni sa 'og na gnas pa ste dmyal ba la sogs pa'o //
T02D1793-2:150b-9: de rnams kyi tshogs ni re zhig rnam par snang
T02D1793-2:150b-10: mdzad yin no zhes pa ni rnam par dag ba'o

T02D1793-2:150b-14: rten dang brten pa nyid du zhes pa ni la

T02D1793-2:150b-18: shing rta la 'dug pa dang rdza mar 'tshod pa'o //
T02D1793-2:150b-19: la la ni tha mi dad pa'i ste shing la
T02D1793-2:150b-20: yal ga dang gdong la mig dang sna la bug
T02D1793-2:150b-21: pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa bzhin no //

T02D1793-2:151a-4: zhes pa ni slob dpon zla ba grags pas rang
T02D1793-2:151a-5: gi bla ma la bstod pa bstan te /

T02D1793-2:154b-3: byis pa lta 'dod pa ni zla ba mthong bar
T02D1793-2:154b-4: ba'o // ba'o // 'dod pas so // sor mo'i
T02D1793-2:154b-5: rtse la lta ba zhes pa ni sor mo tsam
T02D1793-2:154b-6: lta bas zla ba mi mthong ba bzhin no //
T02D1793-2:154b-7: de bas na mtha' drug pa ni nye bar blang ba yin no ;
T02D1793-2:154b-8: / bsod nams yongs su bsngo ba bstan pa'i phyir
T02D1793-2:154b-9: rgyal ba skyes mchog ces pa ni de bzhin gshegs
T02D1793-2:154b-10: pa rab kyi du mas so //
T02D1793-2:154b-11: rnam par bshad pa'i zhes pa ni nges par bstan pa'o //
T02D1793-2:154b-12: mtha' drug lam gang yin zhes pa ni mtha' drug gi dbye ba'o //
T02D1793-2:154b-13: gang zhig 'di dang zhes pa ni rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud de dpal gsang ba 'dus pa'o //
T02D1793-2:154b-14: rgyud tshul ma lus rnam 'byed ces pa ni rgyud
T02D1793-2:154b-15: ma lus pa ni bshad pa'i rgyud dang yan lag
T02D1793-2:154b-16: gi rgyud do // rdo rje phreng ba dang lha mo bzhis yongs su zhus pa la sogs pa'o //
T02D1793-2:154b-17: de rnams kyi tshul ni bshad pa'i dbye ba'o //
T02D1793-2:154b-18: des rnam 'byed ces pa ni gsal bar byas pa'o //
T02D1793-2:154b-19: bshad byas pas zhes pa ni gsal bar bshad nas so //
T02D1793-2:154b-20: bdag gi dge ba gang thob pa ni rnyed pa'o //
T02D1793-2:154b-22: sgron 'bar rgya cher bshad ces pa ni mtha' drug
T02D1793-2:154b-23: gi don mar mes gsal pa 'grel ba'i bshad ba
T02D1793-2:154b-24: 'di'o // ring gnas shing zhes pa ni bskal ba'i mtha'i bar du gnas par gyur cig go //
T02D1793-2:154b-25: de bzhin du bde ba dam pa'i gnas mchog ni rdo rje 'chang chen po'i go 'phang ngo //
T02D1793-2:154b-26: zla ba'i blos ni zla ba bzhin du dri ma
T02D1793-2:154b-27: med pa'i blo gang la yod pa de ni zla
T02D1793-2:154b-28: ba'i blo ste / dri ma med pa'i sems dang ldan par gyur cig go //
T02D1793-2:154b-29: 'gro ba zhes pa ni khams gsum pa'o //
T02D1793-2:154b-30: ldan par gyur cig ni thob par gyur cig pa'o //
T02D1793-2:154b-31: des ni 'grel pa mkhan gyis 'grel ba'i mthar zhar
T02D1793-2:154b-32: la rang gi ming yang bstan to zhes bkra shis
T02D1793-2:154b-33: pa'o // sgron ma gsal bar byed pa'i 'grel ba'i
T02D1793-2:154b-34: t'i ka las le'u bcu bdun pa'i rgya cher bshad
T02D1793-2:154b-35: pa'o // pa'o // man ngag rin chen tshogs kyi rgya mtsho yi //
T02D1793-2:154b-36: bla ma chen po'i dgongs pa la brten te //
T02D1793-2:154b-37: mtha' yas rgyud don rnam par spyod byed pa'o //
T02D1793-2:155a-0: 'grel pa mkhan gyi glegs bam rnams mthong @155a * //
T02D1793-2:155a-2: ; bshad pa dang ni yan lag rgyud thos nas //
T02D1793-2:155a-3: rim pa'i 'grel dang de bzhin rgyud 'grel te //
T02D1793-2:155a-4: shar phyogs su yang cung zad phyin nas ni //
T02D1793-2:155a-5: dam pa rnams las man ngag rgyas thob nas //
T02D1793-2:155a-6: dngos grub gtso mchog rnal 'byor pa rnams kyi //
T02D1793-2:155a-7: zhabs kyi padma spyi bos bkur mnyes pas //
T02D1793-2:155a-8: rmi lam rdo rje sems dpa' mthong nas kyang //
T02D1793-2:155a-9: de las rjes gnang yang dag thob nas ni //
T02D1793-2:155a-10: au rgyan yul du bdag po bdag gis ni //
T02D1793-2:155a-11: mkhas pa'i gtso bo sangs rgyas zhi ba yi //
T02D1793-2:155a-12: slob ma skal ldan grags pa dge slong mchog / sgra tshad lung dang sngags la mkhas pa yi //
T02D1793-2:155a-13: zla ba'i grags pas brtsams pa yi //
T02D1793-2:155a-14: mtha' drug ces bya 'grel ba yang //
T02D1793-2:155a-15: de yi yang ni t'i k'a 'di //
T02D1793-2:155a-16: de nyid gsal bar byed pas byas //
T02D1793-2:155a-17: de nyid kyi ni gzhung gi tshad //
T02D1793-2:155a-18: stong phrag bcu dang drug yin te //
T02D1793-2:155a-19: de ni dpal ldan 'dus pa ni //
T02D1793-2:155a-20: 'grel pa'i don rnams yongs su bsdus //
T02D1793-2:155a-21: gangs dang shel dang mu tig phreng dang zla rgya dang //
T02D1793-2:155a-22: mtshungs pa'i bsod nams sa bon bdag gi gang thob pa //
T02D1793-2:155a-23: yul sprul gyis rdeg 'khrul pa rnams kyis kun du bcom //
T02D1793-2:155a-24: du: kha bral nas 'gro bas rdo rje 'chang nyid thob par shog /
T02D1793-2:155a-25: sgron ma gsal bar byed pa'i t'ika k'a slob dpon
T02D1793-2:155a-26: chen po bha bya k'i rti'i zhal snga nas kyis
T02D1793-2:155a-29: // / yon gyi bdag po gtso bo 'brom jo bo dkon mchog khu mtshan gyis zhus nas /
